text: Hashishe hakajimina bena nvita bonso, hakafuabo munkatshi mua bantu, Yehowa wakangambila ne, Lelu nenuhite ku Ala, butshika bua Moaba: hanualua ba buihi ne Bena Amona, kanubatatshishi, kanuluanganyi n abo; bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba bua Bena Amona bu buhianyi buenu, bualu bua nakamana kuha bana ba Lota buloba abu bu buhianyi buabo

Muakuidi nealue n andi ha buihi, neamuteke ku mpala kua Yehowa ne muakuidi neangate mai a tshijila mu tshivuadi tshia dima, neangate dinfuenkenya dia buloba didi hanshi mu ntenta wa kusambakena, neadiele mu mai
Bikala muntu kayi mumualamme mu musokoka, kadi Nzambi wakamuha mu tshianza tshiandi wakamushiha ku mpukahuka , nunku nenkulongoluele muaba wa yeye kunyemenamu
Munyi tshiakusangana luse ku mesu kuebe bua wewe wakateka bujitu bua bantu aba bonso ham bidi hanyi
Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia mu polovensa katshiena mwa kweela mêyi pa mianda idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene to
Bana balume ba Yisakâ ku meku abo: Tola ne meku a Bena Tola; Puwa ne meku a Bena Puna; Yashuba ne meku a Bena Yashuba, ne Shimelona ne meku a Bena Shimelona
Bobo kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua bana babo; Yehowa udi buhianyi buabo, bu muakabambileye
Nengele nunku mulau udi kayi muanze kuedibua mulau kudi Yehowa munyi
Diambedi nuakadi bungi bua mitoto ya mu diulu kadi nenushale anu banya banya, bualu bua kanuakunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kanuyi bualu bua Yehowa kena munkatshi muenu, kanufu ku mesu kua bantu badi n enu lukuna

Pikala, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu kumpala kwa ndekeelu wa dilonga dia ndongamu wa lupetu, Bukalenga bunene kabuyi bufila tshingenyingenyi tshiabu tshia ndongamu wa lupetu, badi batangila ne Bukalenga ebu budi bumana kudilekeela mudimu
Yeye wakamba ne, Bualu ebu nebuenjibue bu mu mei enu, muntu utuasangana n alu, yeye neikale muhika wanyi, ne bakuabo benu nebahanduke
Neafile muana wa mukoko mukuabo dilolo, neufile mulambu wa bukula bu mûdi wenza dinda ne nvinyo udibo banua, mulambu udibo bosha ha kahia, udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Nakadi nkuenzela nunku dia mbedi, anyi
Mbulamatadi udi usonsola ne wenza mwenda mônso bwa kukuba ditantshisha dia bubanji bwa muntu nkayende, bwa beena ditunga ne bwa beenyi
Bikaleye kayi ne bana babo, yeye neaheshe bana babo ne tatu andi buhianyi buandi
Mapangadika dîyi mashintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila ne mamanyisha badi mwa kuashintulula mu bulongolodi bwawu anu kudi dîyi
Bakateka bintu bia kudia ku mpala kuandi, kadi yeye wakamba ne, Tshiena ndia diambedi tshiyi muanze kunuambila bualu bunakuluila Labana wakamuambila ne, Ambaku
Yeye wakadi ne tshiji tshikole nunku munyi
Tshisamba tshia Gada, Eleyasafa muana mulume wa Luele neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Gada
bilwilu bia ditunga;

Bobo bakamba ne, Bulelela, tuakutangila ne Yehowa udi n ebe, nunku tuakuambilangana ne, Tutshihangane n ebe, tuhunge n ebe tshihungidi, bua wewe kutuenzedi bualu bubi, bu mutuakadi katuyi tukulenga tshianza, tuakukuenzela anu malu mimpe; tua kukumusha talalâ, ne katataka wewe udi musankishibue kudi Yehowa
Budimu bua Labana ne Yakoba Hakalela Lakele Yosefe, Yakoba wakambila Labana ne, Untume ha bule, nye bianyi kuanyi, ku buloba buanyi
Newenzele muhika mukashi muomumue
Nudi basue kuhangisha mitshima ya Bena Isalele bua kuya mu buloba buakabahabo kudi Yehowa munyi

Nudi mua kufila mulume wa ngombe anyi muana wa mukoko udi ne tshidimba tshiandi tshihita bule anyi buihi bu mulambu udi mitshima yenu misue kufila, kadi kanuena mua kufila nyama ei bu mulambu wa kuditshiha n au

Dipangadika dia kulondeshisha ne dia kufunda beena bukalenga bunene badi badieelela tukanda kudi tshitupa tshidi tshipita bûngi tshia beena tshibambalu tshia batshipwiita munwamfwanka bilondeshile bulongolodi bwa dîyi diludiki dia mianda ya munda mwaatshi

Nenumuhe Eleazâ muakuidi, yeye nealue n andi ku butshika bua tshitudilu, nebamushihe ku mesu kuandi, ne Eleazâ muakuidi neangate mashi andi ku munu wandi, neamiamine mashi ku luseke lua tshibuelelu tshia ntenta wa kusambakena misangu muanda mutekete
Bobo bakalongolola matabisha diambedi Yosefe kayi muanze kulua diba hankatshi, bualu bua bakunvua lumu ne, Netudieku n andi bidia

Nunku nebaye ne ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshisumbu tshia Bena Lewi tshikala munkatshi mua bisumbu bikuabo bu mudibo bashikama mu bitudilu, nebaye ku mpala nunku, muntu mu muaba wandi mundi mu muaba wandi ku mabendele abo
Sala wakadia ne, Tshiakaseka, bualu bua yeye wakadi utshina

Kanungu ka Badi mwa kudidila Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kwambaku ne dîyi didibu baswa kupatula kadieena diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu kudi: a Mulombodi wa ditunga, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi alonda dîba divwabo bamutumina dîyi dimana kwanyisha kashidi; b Bukalenge bunene, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi alonda dimutuminabu dia dîyi dimana kwanyisha kashidi, c Batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi batshipwita bakulumpa bûngi butwa ku tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena mu Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi aloonda dianyisha diaadi kashidi
Mpala ya batshipwita bakulumpa badi bayifila kudi bisumbu bia tshidiidi anyi kudi nsangilu wa bisumbu bia tshidiidi
Butue nebulue bu dinfuenkenya dikese mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, butue nebuenzeshe mputa ya mbalanga ham bidi ha bantu ne ham bidi ha nyama mu buloba bua Ejipitu buonso
Kadi Wambile Yoshua dî, ushindike mutshima wandi, umukoleshe; bualu bua yeye neasabuke ku mpala kua bantu aba, neabahianyishe buloba budi utangila
Nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, numuenzele yeye nkayandi mudimu, nuditshihe kudi dina diandi
kashintu, dienza dia kashintu ne bukola bwaaku bwa kujikija mabanza;
Tuakabasa mikete, musoko wa Heshebona udi muhaula tô ne ku Dibona, tuakunyanga buloba tô ne ku Nofa ne ku Medeba
Kadi Noa wakasangana luse ku mesu kua Yehowa
Nutumikile mei anyi onso ne mikenji yanyi yonso, nubienze, meme ndi Yehowa
Ndi Nzambi wa ku Betele kuwakela manyi ha mutu ha dibue, ne kuwakaditshihila kundi, bika biebe, umuka ku buloba ebu, uhingane ku buloba buakakulelabo

Bu Nzambi wa tatu anyi, Nzambi wa Abalahama, ne ditshina dia Isaka kabiyi bikale n anyi, wewe wakadi kuntuma ne bianza bituhu bulelela Nzambi wakutangila dikenga dianyi ne mudimu wa bianza bianyi, ne yeye wakukubela butuku bua lelu
Tunkanuniuna tua Yishemaele Kul
Kulu ne muntu mukuabo nansha: muntu kamueneki ku mukuna nansha: bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe kabidi bintu ku mukuna
Bika biebe, wendakana mu buloba buonso, mu bule buabu ne mu butshiama buabu, bualu bua nenkuhebu
Lota wakabamona, wakabika bua kubakidila, wakabakukiula hanshi
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu Wakabikila baleleshi, wakabambila ne, Bualu kai nuakuenza nunku, nuakusungila bana ba balume
Biashala bidimu bia bungi, neamuhingishile bu mushinga wa kudihikula n au tshituha tshia bintu biakamusumbabo babi
Mose wakangata tshiadi, wakatshinyukula ku mesu kua Yehowa: etshi ntshintu tshia Mose tshia ku tshimpanga tshia kujidila n atshi bakuidi, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Mose wakangata mashi, wakâmiamma ham bidi ha bantu, wakamba ne, Tangilai mashi a dihungila, diakuhunga n enu Yehowa bua mei au onso
Lewitiki Mikenji ya Kuikala ba Tshijila ne Kulumbulula Kuakane Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuikale bantu ba tshijila bualu bua meme Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ndi wa tshijila
Makelela nengimane ha mutu ha mukuna ne mulangala wa Nzambi mu tshianza tshianyi

Bungi bua Bena Lewi bakabalabo kudi Mose ne Alona ne kudi bakelenge ba mu Isalele, ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba bidimu makumi asatu tô ne ku bidimu makumi atanu, buonso buabo bakadi benza mudimu ne bakadi batuala majitu a ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo bakadi binunu muanda mukulu ne nkama itanu ne makumi muanda mukulu
Hashishe nengumushe tshianza tshianyi, ne wewe neumone nyima wanyi; kadi kuena mua kumona mpala wanyi

Kanungu ka Bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu badi babulêja kudi dîyi dilongolodi Njila mwisambombo : Bidi bitangila lupetu lwa Mbulamatadi Kalongu ka kumpala : Bulongolodi bwa mu kabujima Kanungu ka Franc congolais ke udi kabujima kamwe ka kashintu ka Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungala
Badi babuleeja mu mishindu idi mêyi ne mikandu a ditunga mafunda

dienza dia ndongamu wa mianda ya madimi, ya meetu ne ya nzembu idi yambulwisha Ditunga dijima ne ditwangaja dia ndongamu idi yambulwisha polovensa; biâpu bia bia pa madimi ne bishimikidi bidi bifwanangana pamwe ne diabanya dia beenji ba mudimu bilondeshila mukanda mulongolodi wa ngikadilu wa beena mudimu ba mbulamatadi bashindame
Bikaleye kayi musankishe mukelenge wakamubaka, nunku yeye neitabushe ne bamuhikule, kadi yeye kena mua kumuhana kudi ba bende bualu bua yeye wakamudinga

Mu tshidimu tshia makumi anai ne mu ngondo wa dikumi ne umue ne dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo eu, Mose wakamanyisha Bena Isalele bua malu onso akamuambila Yehowa mu mikenji yakabeleleye; hakashiheye Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona, ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakadi ushikama mu Ashetalota ku Edelei
Nakadi kusua bua bantu ba Yehowa bonso bikale baprofete, ne Yehowa ateke Nyuma wandi kudibo
Nunku Bena Isalele bakashikama mu buloba bua Bena Amole

Masanka Alualua kudi Batumikidi ba Yehowa Binunvua mikenji ei, binuayenza, hashishe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nênze tshihungidi ne luse biakalayeye batatu benu: yeye neanusue, neanusankishe, neanuvudishe, yeye neasankishe bana benu kabidi, ne bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba buebe, midioko yenu, ne nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, ne manyi enu ne bana ba ngombe yenu ne bana ba mikoko yenu, mu buloba buakalayeye batatu benu bua kunuhabu

Hanakufika lelu ku mushimi wa mai, nakuamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, biwasua kungendesha dikasa dimpe mu nshila unaya, tangila, hantshidi muimane hehi ne mushimi wa mai, witabushe ne nsongakashi ulualua bua kusuneye mai undi ngambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne Umpeku tuima tua kunua mu mulondo webe, yeye neangandamune dî ne, Nua biebe, nennuishe tumelo biebe kabidi, ka yeye mene ikale mukashi wakasunguila Yehowa muana mulume wa mukelenge wanyi

Hakatangila Yosefe Benyamina n abo, wakambila mulami wa nsubu wandi ne, Ulue ne balume aba mu nsubu, ubashihele nyama, ulongolole bintu bia kudia, bualu bua bantu aba nebadie n anyi bidia diba hankatshi
Nudi mua kulua ne bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola kudi Yehowa, kadi bintu ebi kabiena bu bintu bidi bitua dihembu ha tshioshelu
Dîyi dilongolodi didi dileeja bulongolodi ne lwendu lwa Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya masungulangana mu ditunga
Bobo nebatonde mibi yabo, nebatonde mitu ya batatu abo kabidi disambuka diabo dia mikenji ne kumpidia kuabo, nunku meme nakabahidia, nakabafila mu buloba bua bantu badi n abo lukuna
Bumue tatu anyi neandengele tshianza, ne meme nengikale bu muena mashimi ku mesu kuandi nendieleshe mulau, tshidivuishi disanka

Bobo bakanyenga buloba buandi, ne buloba bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, bakelenge babidi ba Bena Amole, bakadi dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; ku Aloê udi ku butshika bua tshibanda tshia mai a Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Sileona dina dikuabo ne Hêmona , ne buloba buonso bua Alabâ dishiya dia Yadene ku esete tô ne ku dishiha dia mai a Alabâ kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega
Kanungu ka Kakweena muntu udi mwa kudibweelela mu nzubu mwa muntu to
Wakahingana kudiye, ne mona, yeye wakadi muimane ha buihi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia, yeye ne miloho ya Moaba yonso
Bakalua kudi Bena Isalele ne lumu lubi lua buloba buakatentekelabo, bakamba ne, Buloba abu butuakutentekela buta buadia bantu badi bikalamu, bantu bonso batuakamonamu badi bantu ba mibidi minene
Bienza mu Kinshasa dia Yozefu KABILA MUTUDI BANDAMUNA IMWE MIAKU Français Assemblée nationale Tshiluba Autonomie de gestion Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka, Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga

Bakambila Palo ne, Tuakuluila bua kushikama mu buloba ebu, katuena ne muaba wa kudisha bimuna bietu bualu bua tshiole tshidi tshikole mu buloba bua Kanana, nunku tudi tukusengelela ne, Witabushe bua bantu bebe bashikama mu buloba bua Goshene Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Tatu ebe ne bana benu bakulua kudi, buloba bua Ejipitu buonso budi ku mpala kuebe, ushikike tatu ebe ne bana benu mu buloba budi butamba buimpe bashikame mu buloba bua Goshene, ne biwamanya bantu ba lungenyi luimpe munkatshi muabo, ubateke balami ba bimuna bianyi
Bileha, muena mudimu wa Lakele, wakimita difu kabidi, wakalelela Yakoba muana wa balume mukuabo
Bua Lewi yeye wakamba ne, Tumima ne Ulima biebe bikale kudi ûdi musue, uwakateta ku Masa, uwakaluangana n andi ku mai a Meliba
Kabeena mwa kufila aba badi bapengama kudi bukalenga bwa Mbulamatadi budi bubanyanga anyi kabeena mwa kubaalukijamu ku bukola to
Ka bakamanya mua kutangilangana, nansha muntu wakumuka mu muaba wandi tô matuku asatu, kadi munya wakadi mu nsubu ya Bena Isalele bonso
Yetelo wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishibue disanka, wakanusungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu ne mu bianza bia Palô, wakahatula bantu mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu
Mîyama wakashala ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, bantu kabakaya ku luendu to ne hakaluabo ne Mîyama kabidi

Dikengesha dia Badi Batela Dina dia Yehowa Tshitelatela Muana wakadiku, mamu wandi wakadi Muena Isalele ne tatu andi wakadi Muena Ejipitu wakaluhuka munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, muana mulume eu wa mukashi wa Bena Isalele wakasangana ne Muena Isalele mukuabo mu tshituilu, muana mulume wa mukashi wa Bena Isalele wakateta dina dia Yehowa tshitelatela, wakamuhenda, ba kalua handikudi Mose
Yeye wakabisha mesu andi wakamona bakashi ne bana, wakamukonka ne, Bantu aba badi n ebe mbanganyi
Lota wakumuka ku Soâ, wakaya kushikama ku mikuna, yeye ne bana bandi bakashi babidi, wakatshina bua kushikama ku Soâ, wakikala biandi ne bana bandi bakashi babidi mu lubuebue

Yobaba wakafua, ne Hushama, wa mu buloba bua Bena Temana, wakadia bukelenge buandi Hushama wakafua, ne Hadada, muana wa Bedada, wakahita Bena Midiyana bukole mu buloba bua Moaba, wakadia bukelenge buandi, dina dia musoko wandi ne, Awita
Bena Ejipitu nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, hanakuangata butumbi buanyi bualu bua Palô ne makalu andi ne masalayi andi adi enda ha tubalu
Isaka wakambila Esau ne, Mona, nakumana kumuvuisha mukelenge, webe nakufila bana benu bonso kudiye bu bahika bandi nakumujadika ne manvua ne nvinyo muhiamuhia nenkuenzele wewe tshinyi, muan anyi
Kutshinyi, bualu bua Nzambi wakamana kunvua di dia nsongalume mudiye mulale

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nudi bantu ba buhidia bukole, binaya bianyi munkatshi muenu anu tshituha tshikese, nennushihe, nunku nuvule bintu bia kudilengesha n abi, bua meme mmanye tshindi mua kunuenzela
Mubuki wa Midiyana wakadi ne bana ba bakashi muanda mute kete bobo bakaha kusuna mai, bakûsha luvu lua mai tente bua kunuisha mikoko ya tatu abo mai
Uvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, udijidile

Bakokeshi bakalua ne mabue a onyx ne mabue makuabo a kuteka mu efoda ne mu tshilulu tshia ha tshiadi, ne manyi ne bintu bia dihembu dimpe bia kuela mu manyi, ne manyi a muinda ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne manyi adi atua dihembu
Bienza muntu bualu bubi budi Yehowa uhidia, kayi mumanye bualu, yeye neahile, neadituadile dihila dia bubi buandi
Yuda wakamba ne, Netuandamune mukelenge wetu dî manyi
Kanudi mashi, kadi nuahongolole ha buloba bu mai
Dutelonone Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Oga wa ku Bashana Bukole Nom

Kadi bikala mulume usangakena ne mushikankunde udi mubangila kudi mulume mukuabo mu budimi, udi umuakuata ku bukole, udi ulala n andi, anu mulume wakalala n andi neafue biandi; kadi kanuenji mushikankunde bualu; yeye kena muenze bualu bubi budibo mua kumushihela; bualu ebu budi bu muntu udi uhika ku mpala kua muena mutumba n andi udi umushiha; bualu bua yeye wakasangakena n andi mu budimi; ne mushikankunde mubangila kudi mukuabo wakadila, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kumusungila
Habaka mulume mukashi muhia muhia, kayi mu bisumbu bia bena nvita, kabamutekedi bujitu bukuabo; ashale mu nsubu wandi tô tshidimu tshijima, bua kusambeye mukashi wakuangateye
Mose wakasua kushikama ne mulume au, ne yeye wakaha Mose Sipola, muan andi wa bakashi
Bakashi bonso bakadi ne lungenyi lule mu mitshima yabo bakakuma bilulu ne miosa ya mbushi
Nunku Mose wakasonga mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi; wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakabanda ku mukuna wa Sinai, bu muakamuambila Yehowa; wakaya ne mabue abidi mu bianza biandi

Bena Isalele ku Holeba Nuanji kudimuka, nulame mioyo yenu bilengele, bua kanuhu muoyo bua malu anuakatangila ne mesu enu, ne bua mei au kaluhuki mu mitshima yenu matuku onso a muoyo wenu; kadi nuamanyisha bana benu ne bana ba bana benu; dituku dinuakimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Holeba, hakangambila Yehowa ne, Unsangishile bantu, mbunvuishe mei anyi, bua bobo bamanye mua kuntshina matuku abo onso a ha buloba, ne bua bobo bayishe bana babo
Muhika wandi mukashi, dina diandi Leuma, wakamulelela Teba ne Gahama ne Tahasha ne Maka

Nunku bakumuka ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu wa Kola ne Datana ne Abalama ku nseke yonso: ne Datana ne Abilama bakaluhuka, bakimana ku mbelu kua ntenta yabo ne bakashi babo ne bana babo balume ne bana babo bakese
Biakabuela mulume ne mukashi ba bintu bionso, bu muakamuambila Nzambi, ne Yehowa wakamuinshidila tshibi

Mu dituku dia muanda mukulu nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu, kadi nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku muana mulume wa ngombe ne ku tshimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba: ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua

Biwahidia kulekela bantu banyi, nentumine bisumbu bia tuishi kûdi ne kudi bahika bebe ne kudi bantu bebe ne mu nsubu yenu, nsubu ya Bena Ejipitu neyikale ne bisumbu bia tuishi tente, ne hanshi ha buloba kabidi
Mukelenge Palô wakadi ne tuhita tuandi tubidi tshiji, kahita ka bena maluvu ne kuhita ka bena bidia
Nenuikale ne disanka mu bisaka bienu ne mu malonga anudi nuenzelamu mampa
Nunku bakahungakasha tshihungidi ku Bê sheba, ne Abimeleke ne Pikola, kamanda ka masalayi andi, bakabika, bakahingana ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete
Muhika wakamukudimuna dî ne, Nyeye mukelenge wanyi Lebeka wakangata tshilulu tshikudika, wakatshiteka ku mishiku yandi
Mose wakabikila Mishaele ne Elesafana, bana balume ba Uziele, tatu mukuabo wa Alona, wakabambila ne, Luai ha buihi, numushe bana benu ku mpala kua muaba wa tshijila, yai n abo ku nyima kua tshitudilu
Nunku hambila ba ha mutu habo bantu mei au, nebasungile tuhita tua kutoka ku mutu kua bantu
Mu dituku adi mene Palo wakela di kudi tuhita tua bantu ne tupitene tuabo ne, Kanulu bantu bisonsa bia kuenza n abi tushola bu munuakenza diambedi, bobo badikebele bisonsa
Nzambi wakadi ne nsongalume, yeye wakadiunda, yeye wakashikama mu tshihela wakalua tshilembi tshidi ne ndudi
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja bulongolodi, lwendu ne makookeshi a bilumbulwilu bia beena mwabo bôbo nkayabu
Adi akanyika ne atuma dîyi kudi bamfumu ba Mbulamatadi, kudi bamfumu bônso baludiki ba mianda ya mbulamatadi ne ya bilumbulwilu bia bantu bônso ne bia basalayi, ne kudi muntu ne muntu

Bana ba Yuda ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Yuda binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne binai ne nkama isambombo

Nuitabushe balue ne mai, nuvuwe makasa enu, nuikishe bienu mu diledi dia mutshi, nendue ne bintu bia kudia bikese, nukoleshe mitshima yenu hashishe nudi mua kuhita, bualu bua nuenu nuakulua kudi muntu wenu Bakamuambila ne, Enza biebe bu muwakuamba
Bobo bakaha Yakoba nzambi yonso ya bende yakadibo n ai ne nkanu yakadi ku matshu abo, Yakoba wakabijika muinshi mua mutshi munene wakadi hehi ne Shekeme

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata mulangala, usangishe bantu bonso ne wewe ne Alona mukulu ebe, wewe wambile dibue didi ku mesu kuabo, dihatule mai, wewe neubahatuile mai ku dibue, wewe neubanuishe mai ne bimuna biabo
Bana ba balume ba Melali: Mali ne Mushi
Bana ba balume ba Benyamina, Bela ne Bekê ne Ashebele ne Gela ne Nâmana ne Ehi ne Losha ne Mupima ne Hupima ne Ada
Kanungu ka Badi basungula tshipwita wa ditunga bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itaanu
Yeye wakamukudimuna dî ne, Bualu budi bukese bua wakuangata bayanyi, anyi
Mose wakadi ne tshiji tshikole ne yeye wakambila Yehowa ne, Kuitabusha milambu yabo nansha, meme tshiakunyenga umue wabo nyama wandi wa mpunda, tshiakuenzela umue wabo bibi
Mu dituku adi nenuambile muan ebe wa balume ne, Ebu mbualu buwakungenzela Yehowa hanakaluhuka mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Shelomita, muana mukashi wa Dibili, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana
Eyo, nakuangata dî bua kubavudishila disanka yeye wakabavudishila disanka, ne meme tshiena mumanye mua kudikudimuna
Minisitila kavulambedi udi ne bukookeshi bwa kulomba kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa dianyisha dia diteeja dia tshidiidi tshiônso tshijima
Mose ne Alona bakaya kudi Palô, bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa: Alona wakela mulangala wandi hanshi ku mesu kua Palô ne bantu bandi, ne mulangala wakakudimuka nyoka
Nakamuambila ne, Binahanga kuhingana n andi kûdi, hashishe nendituadile bujitu bua bualu ebu tshiendelele

Alona neafile muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi, neadibuikidile bubi ne bua bantu ba mu nsubu muandi, neashihe muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi
Tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Eliaba muana mulume wa Helona neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Zebuluna
Bobo bakabanyangana maloba a bisamba bia bantu akadi kukala kua mai manene, muntu ne muaku wandi, muntu ne muaku wandi, bu mudi meku abo ne bisamba biabo
Hatemesha Alona minda dilolo, yeye neoshe musenga wa manananshi bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa ku bikondo bienu bionso

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi, yeye neafile tshituha tshia dikumi tshia épha wa bukula bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, kedihu nansha manyi nansha musenga wa manananshi, eu mmulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu

Kadi yeye kena ne bualu bua kudikumbashila tubalu tua bungi, anyi bua kuhingisha bantu mu Ejipitu bua kuheteye tubalu tua bungi; bualu bua Yehowa wakamana kunuambila ne, Kanuhinganyi mu nshila au kabidi
Mushindu wa kukumbaja mapangadika adi mu tuloongu tudi ku mutu etu pamwe ne makookeshi makwabo a batshipwita badi bawuleeja kudi mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu
Bukalenge bwenji bwa mêyi kabweena mwa kukosa bilumbu bidi bitangila bilumbulwidi anyi kukudimuna dipangadika dia bilumbulwilu anyi kubenga ne kabadikumbaji to

Nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, mu tshikondo tshinakasungula mu ngondo wa Abiba bualu bua nuakaluhuka mu Ejipitu mu ngondo au muntu kalu ku mesu kuanyi ne bianza bituhu, nenudie bidia bia disanka hanuahuola bintu bia kumudilu binuakakuna mu madimi, nudie bidia bia disanka kabidi kunshikidilu kua tshidimu hanuashikisha kusangisha bintu bionso bia mu madimi
Ndi muteke muanzankongolo wanyi mulu, newikale bu tshimanymu tshia tshihungidi hankatshi hetu ne buloba

Kadi bikala muana mukashi wa muakuidi mukashi wa mu lufuila, anyi mukashi wakahidiabo kudi mulume wandi, ne bikaleye kayi ne muana, bikaleye nuhingane ku nsubu wa tatu andi muakadiye diambedi, yeye neadie bidia bia tatu andi, kadi muenyi kena mua kudia bintu ebi
Meme nengikale munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, nengikale Nzambi wabo

Yeye wakabambila ne, Edi ndî diakuamba Yehowa ne, Makelela udi dituku dia kuikisha dia tshijila, dituku diakadijidila Yehowa nulambe bidia ne munyinyi binudi basue, ne bintu bionso bidi bishala, nubitekele bua kudia makelela
Muana wa bakashi wa Palô wakalua kuowa mai mu musulu au, bantu bandi bakashi bakendakana ku muelelu wa mai, yeye wakamona tshisaka mu malenge, wakatuma muntu wandi ne, Ya utshiangate
Yehowa wakambila tshisumbu tshienu tshionso mei â ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, mu difutu dinene, ne mu midima mikole ne dî dikole; kena usangisha mei makuabo ha mutu
Kuvudishila Bantu Disanka kudi Bakuidi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne, Nenuvudishile Bena Isalele disanka nunku, nenubambile ne, Yehowa anusankishe, anulame
Bikaleye kayi ne muana wa bakashi, yeye neaheshe bana babo buhianyi buandi
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne muku wandi udi ne mulau
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ushiha Kana, nebamusombuele misangu muanda mutekete Yehowa wakalekela Kana tshimanyinu bua wamusangana kamushihi
Yosefe wakadisha tatu andi ne bana babo ne bantu bonso bakadi mu nsubu wa tatu andi, ku meku abo
Enza mitshi ya acacia ibidi, ulamike or ku nseke yonso
Enza bintu bu nsengu ya ngombe ku matumba anai, enza nsengu ne dibaya dimue, lamika tshiamu tshia mitaku ku nseke yonso
Tunkanunuina tua Sheme Kul
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia mai, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso
Bintu bidi ne bualu bua kuhikudibua bia ngondo umue, wewe neubihikule bu mudi mushinga wabi, nshekele itanu bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu nshekele udi bu guéras makumi abidi
Masanka Asatu Majalame Ek

MUTU WA MUKANDA WA KUMPALA I : BULONGOLODI BWA MU KABUJIMA Tshitupa Tshia kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi ne Didikookesha Njila wa kumpala : Bidi bitangila Mbulamatadi Kanungu ka kumpala Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi, anu mu mikalu yadi ya mu dia a kashipunkenza ayi, Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu, mudikadile, mudikookesha, musangisha ne kayi kwabanya, udi utangila majinga a bantu, wa mungalata ne kayi mutwa ku tshia tshisumbu tshia ditabwija nansha tshimwe
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha mbushi wa mulambu wandi, neamushihe kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Isalele wakambila Yosefe ne Tshiakuelangana meji kua kumona mpala webe, kadi mona, Nzambi wakundesha bana bebe kabidi

Aba mbana balume ba Gilada: Yezê ne meku a Bena Yezê, Heleke ne meku a Bena Heleke; Aseliele ne meku a Bena Aseliele; Shekeme ne meku a Bena Shekeme; Shenuda ne meku a Bena Shenuda, Hefê ne meku a Bena Hefê
Kanunugu ka : Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi wimana wambila beena ditunga mianda
Au mmeku a bana balume ba Ashê, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai
buludiki bwa bilumbulwilu, bwa nzubu ya buloko ne tshinyongopelu ne ya mashika;

Yeye neamushe dianyi dionso dia muana wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne dianyi didi ha mutu ha bintu bia munda, tumuma tubidi ne dianyi didi ha mutu hatu hehi ne bituntuku bia bibelu ne lukutu lua mutshima ne lua tumuma neanumushe, bu mudibo bumusha dianyi dia muana wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kuikisha n au ditalala, muakuidi neabioshe ha tshioshelu tshia kahia
Kanusuiki nkata ku mishiku ya ngombe udi udiata mponda
Dijooja dia tshiakabidi edi kabeena mwa kudibenga to
Mose wakalua ne Alona ne bana bandi balume, wakabowesha ne mai
Yeye wakamba ne, Nue biebe, mukelenge wanyi, yeye wakatula mulondo wandi lubilu mu tshianza tshiandi, wakamunuisha
Mu dituku disambombo nebalongolole bidibo bangate, bikale tshituha ha mutu ha tshituha tshidibo basangisha ku dituku ku dituku
Bakaya ku luendu luabo lua kumudilu bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Wakatemesha minda ku mpala kua Yehowa bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Buela biebe ne balume ba nyunyu muanda mutekete ne bakashi ba nyunyu muanda mutekete, bua kusungila mioyo ya bintu
Katataka ya biebe, uye ne bantu ku muaba unakukuambila, tangila, muanjelo wanyi neaye ku mpala kuebe, kadi dituku dinalua kudibo, nembenzele kabidi bu mudi bubi buabo
Wakamba kabidi ne, Ndi bianyi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka, Nzambi wa Yakoba Mose wakayikila mesu andi, wakatshina kutangila Nzambi
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Dana bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama isambombo

Bialuangana balume ne badi bakulua mukashi udi ne difu, ne yeye udi utula difu, kadi dikenga dikuabo kadiena dilonda ku nyima, yeye wakamukuma neafutie mulume wandi bintu bidiye musue, yeye neamufute bintu bidi balumbuluishi bamba
Kabeena mwa kufunda, kukwata , kweela mu lukanu anyi kupiishisha muntu kampanda bwa bwaalu bwenza kudi munga muntu to
Nutumikile mikenji yanyi, nuyenze meme ndi Yehowa udi unulengesha
Bantu ba mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ nebashikame hehi n andi

Kadi bikala tshilamulamu tshitampakane mu dikoba, hakashikisheye kudilesha kudi muakuidi bualu bua kudilengesha, nunku yeye neadileshe kudi muakuidi kabidi, muakuidi neatangile ne bikala tshilamulamu tshitampakane mu dikoba, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane disama edi didi dia nsudi

Kanungu ka Padi Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu kadibu bakonkesha kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga, kudi Bukalenga bunene, kudi tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia batshipwita bakulumpa, kamba ne ndondu anyi diumvwangana ne ditunga dikwabo udi ne kambilu kadi kakayi kumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu, dijadika anyi dianyisha didi mwa kwenzeka amu panyima pa dilongolola dia Dîyi dikulu
balongolola tulasa mu Bulongolodi bwa tulasa mu ditunga dijima budi ne bilongelu bia mbulamatadi ne bilongelu bidikadila bianyisha
Mose wakadi ne tshiji kudi ba ku mutu kua bena nvita, tuhita tua binunu binunu ne tuhita tua nkama nkama, bakahingana ku nvita
Nuanji kulala bienu kunoko butuku ebu kabidi, bua meme kumanya dî didi Yehowa ungambila kabidi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ulue biebe kundi ha mukuna, wikaleku, nenkuhe mabue adi ne mikenji inakufunda, bua wewe kuyiyisha bantu

Nenuenze bu mudibo bamba ha muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nuenu nenutumikile mei onso adibo banuyisha: nenuenze bu mudi mikenji idibo banuyisha, ne bu dilumbulula didibo banuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi mu dî didibo banuambila
Kalongu kibîdi : Bidi bitangila tshibutshilu tshinena Kanungu ka Tshibutshilu tshinene tshia Kongu ke tshidi tshikala nzubu mupatudi wa kashintu wa ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Haditshiha mulume kudi Yehowa, anyi halayeye mulayi wandi, yeye kena mumanye mua kulekela dî diandi, yeye nênze mei onso akaluhuka mukana muandi
Nomba Dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete nenuikale ne disangisha dia tshiula, kanuenji mudimu, edi ndituku didibo bela mpungi

Meme ndi mbikila diulu ne buloba bu bamonyi ba bualu ne, Nakuteka muoyo ne lufu, ne disanka ne mulau ku mpala kuenu lelu: muiku nudisunguile muoyo, nenuikale ne muoyo ne nuenu ne bana benu, bua kunanga Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kutumikila dî diandi, ne bua kumulamata; bualu bua yeye udi muoyo wenu ne muvudishi wa matuku enu; nunku nenushikame mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu, Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bua kubahabu

Tuetu tuakulua ne mulambu wa Yehowa, bintu biakangatabo kudi mundi ne mundi, bintu bia or ne nkanu ya ku mikolo ne nkanu ya ku maboko ne tukanu tua ku munu, lukanu tua ku matshu ne tukanu tua ku nshingu, bualu bua kubuikidila n abi bubi buetu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Labana wakamuambila ne, Kabena benza nunku mu buloba buetu, katuena tufila muan a mukala ku dibaka diambedi mukulu andi kayi muanze kuya
Kanudi mashi, nansha a nyunyu nansha a nyama mu nsubu yenu

Yeye wakalalahu butuku abu wakasungula bintu biakadiye n abi bua kuambika mukulu andi Esau matabisha mashina a mbushi nkama ibidi ne mpumbu ya mbushi makumi abidi, mashina a mikoko nkama ibidi ne mikoko ya bimpanga makumi abidi, ne tumelo tudibo bakama mabele makumi asatu ne bana batu, ne ngombe idibo bakama mabele makumi anai, ne balume ba ngombe dikumi mashina a mpunda makumi abidi ne nkungulu yai dikumi
Nuenu nuenze mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nubilonde meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Mu bibangidilu bia ngondo yenu nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bana balume ba ngombe babidi ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne bintu bisatu bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku muana wa mukoko yonso, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa

Mu dîba dia mvita anyi didibo bapeesha bilwilu bukookeshi bwa kubweeja bulongama mu bantu bônso,anyi didibo badiundisha bukookeshi bwa kubwejabu budipope, Mulombodi wa Ditunga mu dipangadika dilonga mu Kapangu ka baminisitila, udi mwa kwanji kwimanyika pa tshipaapu tshiônso tshia Ditunga anyi pa tshitupa tshimwe tshiaadi ne bwa bûngi bwa matuku ne bibawu bidiye uteela, midimu ya dinyookangana ya bilumbulwidi bia bantu bônso pa kumbusha beena tshidiidi, bwa kuyipeesha bilumbulwidi bia basalayi
Bena Isalele bonso bakatontolola Mose ne Alona, bakabambila ne, Biakadi bimpe tuafuila mu Ejipitu, anyi tuafuila mu tshihela etshi
Olodonase ya Mulombodi wa Ditunga mikwabo idibo kabayi balongolola kudi tunungu twa mulongo wa kumpala, , ,ne badi bayitwa tshiâla tshibîdi ku dia bakaji kudi Minisitila kavulambedi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nenuhidie kutumikila mikenji ne mei anyi musangu bule munyi
Dijika dia midimu didi dienzeka padi tshibambalu tshijikija ndongamu uvwabo batshibikidila ne bikala kabayi bapitshisha matuku makumi asatu kutwadijila ku dituku dia mbangilu wa midimu

Noa wakindila matuku muanda mutekete makuabo, wakatuma nyunyu wa nkutshi kabidi, nyunyu wakahingana kudiye dilolo, ne monai, wakadi ne katamba ka mutshi wa olive kabishi ku muinu, nunku Noa wakamanya ne mai akadi makehe ha buloba
Tshidi tshibweela misangu kayiyi mishadila ku ibidi ku tshidimu pa dibiikila dia Mulombodi watshi
Mose wakatua mulambu wa Yehowa kudi Eleazâ bu mulambu udibo banyukula, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bintu bia mu Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek
Batatu kabafuidi bana babo, ne bana kabafuidi batatu abo: muntu yonso adifuile bua malu mabi andi

Bakalamata Kedolaomê to bidimu dikumi ne bibidi, ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bisatu, bakatomboka Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne binai Kedôlaome wakalua ne bakelenge bakadi n andi, bakahita Bena Lefa ba mu Ashelota kânayima bukole, ne Bena Zusa ba mu Hama, ne Bena Eme ba mu Shawe kiyatayima, ne Bena Holi ba ku mikuna ya Sei to ne ku Ele palana, hehi ne tshihela
Mabue a nvula ne miele ya nvula biakabuelakana, biakatamba bikole, kabakatangila bualu abu mu buloba bua Ejipitu katshia bualua tshisamba tshia bantu
Ka nuenji mudimu, nenufile mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Udilongolole dinda, Ulue biebe ne dinda ku mukuna wa Sinai; Ulue biebe kundi ku mutu kua mukuna
Nunku bakafunda mu mukanda dina diau Nvita ya Yehowa ne, Waheba wa mu Sufa ne tshibanda tshia Ânona, buloba budi busendama mu tshibanda ku musoko wa Ala hehi ne butshika bua Moaba
Noba wakaya wakanyenga Kenata ne misoko mikuabo wakidika musoko wandi ne Noba, bu diba diandi

Yuda Udi Wakuila Benyamina Hashishe Yuda wakalua ha buihi n andi, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, witabushe, ndi nkutendekena, bua muntu webe ambile di ku matshu a mukelenge wanyi kunakadi ne tshiji kudi muntu webe, bualu bua wewe udi bu Palo mene

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi bielela bingenyingenyi bia mêyi a mpetu tukanda mu mushindu udibo bateeka bwa dîyi dilongolodi didibo bâmba mu kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu
Mukashi wakamuebesha ne, Wewe neungeyeke tshieya to ne hawamutuma, anyi

Bakudima kuyaya dîba Kuyaya kumpengelela kwadi Bilumbu ni bya salala bya ya Ngondu wa kubanda mulundingu Mukàjì mufwà bintu bibombe Maman Ndimi Ngoyi Maman Colonel Yaye lele yaye lele Ngimba ne Mulume Mutombo ee Ngimba ne Ange Kayembe ee Ngimba ne Ngalula Waba Milolo ee Ngimba ne Yaya Sangye e Ngimba ne Mputu wa ba Ntumba ee Tangila Kabeya Ndombie Twayi lona, lekelayi mwadi Balongeshi bakalukanyia Simon Kabila lekela we Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi ee Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi ee Bakulumpa bakadima kwěpì Bakadima kuyaya dîba Kuyaya kumpengelela kwànyì Bulumbu ni byà salala bya ya Ngondu wa kubanda mulundingu Mukàjì mufwa bintu bibombe Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona ee Byà kulwa disànka Twayi lona we Byà kulwa disànka Maestro

Bakumuka mu tshihela, bakaya ku Matana: bakumuka ku Matana, bakaya ku Nahaliele, bakumuka ku Nahaliele, bakaya ku Bamota, bakumuka ku Bamota, bakaya mu tshibanda tshia mu buloba bua Moaba tô ne ku mutu kua mukuna wa Pisega, kuakatangilabo tshihela
Yakoba wakamba ne, Anji kunsumbisha bintu bia buan a bute diambedi

Katataka, ndi nkusengelela ne, Bukole bua Yehowa buikale bunene, bu muwakuamba ne, Yehowa kena ukuata tshiji lubilu, udi mûle tente ne luse lujalame, utu wabuikila bubi ne kuhanga bia bantu, kena ubingisha muntu utu wenza bubi, utu watumina bana ba tshihungu tshisatu anyi tshinai mibi ya batatu abo

Aba mbakelenge ba bana ba balume ba Esau bana ba balume ba Elifasa, muan a bute wa Esau, bakadi mukelenge Temana, ne mu kelenge Oma ne mukelenge Sefo ne mukelenge Kanaza ne mukelenge Kola ne mukelenge Gatama ne mukelenge Amaleka, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Elifasa mu buloba bua Edome, aba mbana ba balume ba Ada
Hakadi Palô ne bantu bandi tshiji, yeye wakatubuesha ne kahita ka bena bidia mu nsubu wa lukanu, bubidi buetu tuakalota bilota dituku dimue, bu mudi dijingulula dia tshilota tshiandi

Kadi muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bienu bionso, bua kujadikamu dina diandi: nenukebe muaba kudiye mushikame, nenudisangisheku; nenulueku ne milambu yenu ya kuosha, ne nyama mishiha, ne bintu bia dikumi bia bintu bienu, ne bintu bienu bidibo bakuha, ne milambu ya kuditshiha kuenu, ne bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu

Muakuidi neahingane dituku dia muanda mutekete, neatangile kabidi, ne bikala disama ditampakane mu bimanu bia nsubu, muakuidi nêle di bua kumusha mabue akadi ne disama, nebêle mu muaba udi kauyi muakane ku butshika bua musoko, nebakuone munda mua nsubu, nebêle bintu bidibo bakuona ku butshika bua musoko mu muaba udi kauyi muakane, nebangate mabue makuabo, nebâbueshe mu miaba ya makuabo, nebajinguile makuabo mu miaba yakadi makuabo
Numushihe anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu; kanumushihi anu ku dî dia mumonyi umue
bulongolodi bwa dishintakaja dia kashintu
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asambombo ne bibidi ne nkama muanda mutekete

Kanubengi muenyi anyi bana ba nshiya dilumbulula didi diakane; kanuangatshi bilulu bia mukashi wa mu lufuila bu tshieya: nuvuluke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu, ne Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhikula: bua bualu ebu nakunuelela mukenji eu
Bantu bakafua ku disama adi bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Bana balume bonso ba bakuidi nebaudie, etshi ntshintu tshitambe tshijila

Yehowa wakamba ne, Nakubabuikidila bubi bu mudi dî diebe, kadi bulelela, bu mundi ne muoyo, ne bu mudi buloba bûle tente ne butumbi bua Yehowa, bualu bua bantu aba bakamona butumbi buanyi ne malu anyi a kukema anakenza munkatshi muabo mu Ejipitu ne mu tshihela, kadi bakunteta munda misangu ei dikumi, kabakunvua dî dianyi, bulelela, bobo kabena batangila buloba bunakalaya batatu abo, bantu bakampidia kabena babutangila, kadi muntu wanyi Kaleba, bualu bua yeye udi ne mutshima mukuabo munda muandi, ne yeye wakundonda bulelela, nendue n andi mu buloba buakayeye, tunkanunuma tuandi netubuhiane
Muana mulume wenu wa mukoko neikale muakane ne wa tshidimu tshimue nebamuangate munkatshi mua mikoko anyi mua mbushi

Bakenza n atshi nkanu ya ku tshibi tshia nsubu, ne tshioshelu tshia nyama ne biamu bitshiamakane, ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, ne nkanu ya ku luhangu, ne nkanu ya ku tshibi tshia luhangu, ne milonda yonso ya mu nsubu, ne milonda yonso ya mu luhangu lua ku muaba wa tshitendelelu
Hanukonka bana benu ne, Nudi nuenzela tshilele etshi tshinyi
Nukoleshe mitshima yenu, nulue ne mamuma a mu buloba abu Hakayabo nunku, mamuma a nvinyo akabanga kulua
Bakenza mukaba wa efoda bu muakadibo benza efoda ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Mulombodi wa kumpala wa Kabadi kashipi ka mapangadika ke udi ubuludika
Isalele wakamba ne Bualu budi bulelela Yosefe muan anyi utshidi ne muoyo nenye kumumona diambedi tshiyi muanze kufua

Bungi bua bana balume ba Gêshona bakabalabo ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, ba mu bidimu makumi asatu tô ne ku bidimu makumi atanu, buonso buabo bakadi benza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bakabalabo ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo bakadi binunu bibidi ne nkama isambombo ne makumi asatu
Bidi bienzela ditunga diônso dijima mudimu
Dutelonone Buloba Buimpe bua Kuhiana Nuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, nukumbane, nubuelemu bua kuhiana buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu
Mose wakangata mulangala ku mpala kua Yehowa bu muakamuambileye
Nudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene to matuku muanda mutekete, ne dituku dia muanda mutekete nudie bidia ku mesu kua Yehowa
Diba diakadi dimane kubanda mulu hakabuela Lota mu Soa
Muntu yonso udi usangisha manyi bu au, anyi udi waela muenyi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Bidi bibaluluke bu bibanda, bu bibunda bidi hehi ne musulu, bu mitshi ya aloe yakakunabo kudi Yehowa, bu mitshi ya cèdre idi hehi ne mai
Kuvudi mukashi wa tatu ebe bilulu, yeye udi bu tatu mene
Kanungu ka : Bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu budi budilekelela ne bukalenga bulongolodi bwa mêyi ne mikandu ne kabidi ne Bukalenga bunene

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Halelabo muana kudi ngombe anyi kudi mukoko anyi kudi mbushi, yeye neikale ne mamu andi matuku muanda mutekete, ku dituku dia muanda mukulu ne matuku adi ku mpala badi mua kumufila bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Bualu bua bintu bionso biakumusha Nzambi kudi tatu etu mbietu ne bia bana betu, nunku wenza malu onso akukuambila Nzambi

Bikala muntu ne muana mulume udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, katu watumikila dî dia tatu wandi anyi dia mamu wandi, ne yeye katu wabahvuila biamukengeshaho, hashishe tatu wandi ne mamu wandi nebamukuate, nebaluhuke n andi kudi bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne ku tshibi tshia musoko; nebambile bakulu ba mu musoko wabo ne, Muana wetu eu udi ne tshitshu ne buhidia, kena utumikila mei etu; udi muena lumpukusu ne mukuatshiki wa maluvu

Kanungu ka Bukalenga bunene kabweena mwa kutumina nzuji dîyi padiye mu mudimu wende to, anyi kutangila bilumbu, anyi kunyangakaja lwendu lwa dilumbulwisha, anyi kubenga mwa kukumbaja dipangadika dia bilumbulwilu
Nujimishe bantu bonso badi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ufila mu bianza bienu; kanubafuidi luse, kanutendeledi nzambi yabo; bualu ebu nebuikale bu buteyi kunudi
Bobo bakamuku dimuna ne, Tuetu, bantu bebe, tudi bana dikumi ne babidi ba muntu umue wa mu buloba bua Kanana, ne mona, muana wa mukala udi mushale ne tatu wetu katataka, ne mukuabo kenaku

Kudi dinyanga dia lumu anyi diupula dia mushinga wa ditunga bu mudi dîba didi lwendu lwa Mulombodi wa Ditunga anyi lwa Minisitila wa Kavulambedi lubengangana ne bibidilu bia mulowu anyi padibo babajadikila ne badi bênza, bênza pamwe anyi bambulwisha bakwabo mu ditulakaja dibi dia lupetu, dibwejilangana anyi dineema dikandikibwe
Balume bonso nebalue ku mesu kua Mukelenge Nzambi misangu isatu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Kadi bobo kabakitabusha dî dia Mose, bakuabo bakabishiya tô ne ku dinda, bishi biakabuelamu, bidia biakanunka muhuya mubi, Mose wakadi n abo tshiji
Nenudie bidia nunku ku mesu kua Yehowa matuku muanda mutekete ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso, nenuenze bualu ebu mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete
Muntu ne muntu wakangata bintu biandi bia nvita; nuakamba kuya ku mikuna
Nunku witabushe bua meme kuya bua kujika tatu wanyi, nempingane kûdi kabidi
Nzambi wakavuluka Lakele, Nzambi wakamunvuala, wakajilula munda muandi

Yeye wakungambila ne, Yehowa, undi ngendakana ku mpala kuandi, neatume muanjelo wandi n ebe, neakuendeshe dikasa dimpe, ne wewe newangatshile muan anyi mulume mukashi kudi bana betu ne kudi ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi Hashishe, munda muebe nemuikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku, hawaya kudi bana betu, biahidiabo kukuha mukashi, munda muebe nemuikale mutoke ku kuditshiha eku
Wewe newangate tshimpanga tshikuabo, Alona ne bana bandi balume nebatentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu ha tshimpanga
Hashishe Mose ne Alona bakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele
Bintu ebi nebikale bilamibue mu diyeba bua bidimu muanda mutekete bia tshiole tshilualua mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua bena buloba kabafu ne tshiole

Bikala bantu ba mu nsubu banya banya, muena nsubu neatahulule muana wa mukoko ne muena nsubu udi hehi n andi ku bungi bua bantu badi mu nsubu, bobo babale bungi bua bantu badi mua kudia muana wa mukoko umue
Yeye wakatshina, wakamba ne Muaba eu ngua bualu bukole udi nsubu wa Nzambi ne bu mushiku wa diulu
Genese Yosefe Udi Ujinguluila Bena Lukanu Bilota Biabo Hakashika malu au, mutuadi wa maluvu wa mukelenge wa Ejipitu ne mulambi wa bidia biandi bakafikisha mukelenge wabo wa Ejipitu munda
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Palati, muana mulume wa Lafu
Udi uleeja mpala wa ditunga ne udi tshimanyinu tshia bobumwe bwa ditunga
Eu udi mukenji wa mulambu wa bukula bana balume ba Alona nebaufile ku mesu kua Yehowa ku mpala kua tshioshelu
Nvula yakaloka tô matuku makumi anai, mai akavulangana, akabandisha buatu ha mutu, buakabandishibua ku buloba
Hashishe Abalahama wakahingana kudi bansongalume bandi, bakabika, bakaya bonso hohamue ku Be sheba, Abalahama wakashikama mu Be sheba
Biwangata tshilulu tshia mukuenu bu tshieya, wewe neutshihingashe kudiye diambedi diba kadiyi dianzekubuela, bualu bua tshiotshi tshidi anu tshiandi tshia kudibuikila n atshi, yeye nealale tulu munyi
Belâma wakitaba kudi miloho ya Balaka ne, Biampa Balaka nsubu wandi mûle tente ne argent ne or, tshiena mumanye mua kuhidia dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, bua kuenza bualu bukese anyi bualu bunene
Abimeleke wakebesha Abalahama ne, Wakuteka bana aba ba mikoko muanda mutekete ha buabo bua tshinyi
Kalongu kitânu : Bidi bitangila ndekeelu wa mudimu wa tshipwita wa ditunga anyi wa tshipwita mukulumpa
Bobo bakamuitaba ne, E, yeye udi ne bukole, ne tangila, muan andi wa bakashi, Lakele, ulualua ne mikoko
Kanungu ka Polovensa mudibo bayitela kudi kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi idi yenza bitupa bia malaba bia masungula a batshipwita bakulumpa ba Bukalenga bwa kumpala
Bintu bionso bia tshijila bia muntu ne muntu nebikale biandi, ne bintu bionso bidi muntu uha muakuidi nebikale biandi
Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Bilele bia Bena Buloba Hanuabuela mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, kanuyidi bua kulonda ku nyima kua malu a bundu a bisamba abi

Abalahama wakangata Yishemaele, muan andi mulume, ne bana bonso bakaledibua mu nsubu wandi, ne bantu bonso bakasumbibua ku argent yandi, bantu balume bonso ba mu nsubu wa Abalahama bakatengudibua dituku adi mene bu muakamuambila Nzambi
Nunku bakabikila dina dia musoko au ne, Soâ
Ku nyima muakuny andi wakahatuka ne tshianza tshiandi tshikuata ku tshikankanyi tshia Esau Bakamuidika dina ne, Yakoba Isaka wakadi ne bidimu makumi asambombo hakamuleleleye bana
Monai, bobo bakenzesha Bena Isalele bua kuenzabo malu mabi kudi Yehowa bualu bua dî dia Belâma mu bualu bua Peô, nunku dikenga dikole diakadi munkatshi mua bantu ba Yehowa
Nomba Mpungi ya Tshiamu tshia Argent Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Enza biebe mpungi ibidi ya tshiamu tshia argent tshiakafulabo, wewe neubikile n ai bantu bua kutendelela ne bua kubisha luendu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Bualu bua nuenu kanuakungitabusha bua kunjidila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele, nunku kabuena nulua ne bantu aba mu buloba bunakubaha
Hakakumbana matuku andi, monai, bana ba makasa bakadi munda muandi
Hakatshiabu Yehowa Wakenza bualu ebu; bimuna bionso bia mu Ejipitu biakafua, kadi bimuna bia Bena Isalele kabiakafua nansha tshimue
MUTU WA MUKANDA VII: Bidi bitangila ndondu ne diumvwangana ne matunga makwabo Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upunga ne ujadika ndondu ne diumvwangana ne matunga makwabo
Neubamanyishe mei a Nzambi ne mikenji, neubaleshe nshila udibo ne bua kuendamu, ne mudimu udibo ne bua kuenza

MUTU WA MUKANDA V: Bidi bitangila Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga Kanungu ka Mbâsa mu ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga

Bialenga mundi tshianza tshiandi ha tshintu tshidi ne bukoya, nansha bukoya bua mundi nansha bukoya bua nyama nansha tshintu tshikuabo tshidi ne bukoya, ne biadieye munyinyi wa mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala udibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Tshintu tshionso tshidibo bajila mu Isalele netshikale tshiebe
Mose wakabatuma ku Kanâna bumuke ku tshihela tshia Palana, muakamba Yehowa buonso buabo bakadi balume ba ku mutu kua Bena Isalele
Nunku Alona wakalua ha buihi ne tshioshelu, wakashihela kana ka ngombe ka mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi
Yehowa nealue n enu ne mukelenge unuakateka ku mutu kuenu kudi tshisamba tshinudi kanuyi bamanye, nansha nuenu nansha bankambua benu; nenutendeleleku nzambi mikuabo ya mitshi ne mabue

Hakatangila Esau ne bana bakashi ba Bena Kanana kabakasankisha mutshima wa Isaka tatu andi, Esau wakaya kudi Yishemaele, wakangata Mahalata muana mukashi wa Yishemaele muana wa Abalahama, wakadi muan abo wa bakashi ne Nebayota bu mukashi wandi, ha mutu ha bakashi bakadiye n abo

Eu udi mukenji wa nyama ne wa nyunyu ne wa bintu bidi bienda mu mai ne bintu bionso bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, bua kutahulula bintu bibi ne bintu bimpe, ne bintu bidi ne muoyo binudi mua kudia ne bintu bidi ne muoyo binudi kanuyi mua kudia
Hawela mpungi bikole tshiakabidi, bantu ba mu bitudilu bia ku sude nebaye ku luendu luabo, bobo nebele mpungi bikole bua luendu luabo
Dibaya dimue diakadi ne tutshi tua bituha tutshiamakasha hankatshi ha dibaya, bakenza mabaya onso a mu nsubu nunku
Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu andi ne, Nendianjile kudi Palô, nemmuambile ne, Bana betu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi bakadi mu buloba bua Kanâna bakulua kundi
Uteke tshioshelu tshia or tshia musenga wa manananshi ku mpala kua mushete, ukudike tshilulu ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Wewe newenze bualu ebu bua kubajidila bankuatshile mudimu wa buakuidi
Tuetu tudi bu benyi ku mesu kua tatu etu nansha
Genese Bufukibua Kale ku tshibangidilu Nzambi wakafuka diulu ne buloba

Bidi bilwa mêyi badi babimanyisha, kumpala kwa dishintakaja ngenyi ne dibianyisha, Bukalenge bunene budi butumina, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi aloonda dibituma, wabu ngelelu wa meeji ku Bilo bia Tshibambalu etshi anyi tshiatshia
Hanualua ne mulambu wa kubisha n au ditalala kudi Yehowa, nûfile ne mutshima udiye mua kuitabusha
Mêyi a ditunga adi afila buludiki bwa dibaka
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Mona, nakubanga kufila Sihona ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshienu, bua nuenu nuhiane buloba buandi
Aba mbantu bakabalabo ba Bena Isalele ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua bantu bakabalabo ba mu bitudilu biabo ku bisumbu biabo buakadi binunu nkama isambombo ne bisatu ne nkama itanu ne makumi atanu
Kadi bana ba bakashi badi kabayi banze kumanyibua kudi balume nubashiye ne muoyo bualu buenu
Muele wa nvita neubashihe ha bula, ne buowa nebubuele mu nsubu yabo; nebashihe bansongalume ne bansongakashi batshidi tumama, ne bana batshidi bamua mabele ne bakulumpe badi ne nvi ku mitu kuabo
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia ibidi, wakalamina or ku nseke yai yonso
Yeye wakaya kudi tatu andi, wakamba ne, Tatu anyi, ne yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku wewe udi nganyi, muan anyi
Nunku Yehowa wakasungila Bena Isalele mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu dituku adi Bena Isalele bakatangila Bena Ejipitu bafue kukala kua mai manene
Bantu bakalua kudi Mose, bakamba ne, Tuakuenza bibi bualu bua tuetu tuakujiana Yehowa ne wewe kabidi, ulombe Yehowa atumushile nyoka munkatshi muetu Mose wakalombela bantu Nzambi
Wakalua ne mushete mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, wakakudika tshilulu, wakajibikila mushete bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Bulongolodi bwakane bwa Dîyi dikulu budi buleeja tshitupa tshia midimu tshipungila bukalenga buludiki bwa ku mutu ne polovensa, ne kabidi budi buleeja tshitupa tshidi makalenga abidi a Mbulamatadi aa afwilakana
Tshiena ne buimpe bua kudiangatshila tshituha tshia luse ne bulelela biwakalesha muntu webe, nakasabuka musulu eu wa Yadene anu ne tshibangu, katataka nakulua bisumbu bibidi bia bintu
Abalama wakamba ne, Tangila, wewe kuena muanze kumpa muana, ne muntu muledibue mu nsubu wanyi, yeye udi muhianyi wa bintu bianyi
Bana balume ba Palu: Eliaba
kubotakaja lwendu lwa bishimikidi bia Mbulamatadi;
Nennuhe ditalala mu buloba, nenulale tulu, ne bantu kabena banutshinyisha, nengihate nyama mibi mu buloba buenu, ne kabena balue ne muele wa nvita mu buloba buenu
Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima badi benza mudimu wabo pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia ditunga, mu dineemeka dia Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi ne dia mêyi ne mikandu ya Ditunga

Lewitiki Mikenji bualu bua Bena Nsudi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Bikala muntu ne tshiuja tshikese mu dikoba diandi anyi tshilamulamu anyi ditoba ditoke tô, bikala bintu ebi bu disama dia nsudi, nebalue n andi kudi Alona muakuidi anyi kudi umue wa bana bandi balume bakuidi
Yehowa wakamukonka ne, Mufuki wa mukana mua bantu nganyi
Kalongu kisâtu : Bidi bitangila Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu
Kanuena nutujiana, nudi nujiana Yehowa
Meme nembutule buloba buenu, ne bantu badi n enu lukuna badi bashikamamu nebakeme bua bualu buabu

Genese Nzambi Udi Uvudishila Yakoba Disanka ku Betele Nzambi wakambila Yakoba ne, Bika biebe uye ku Betele, ushikameku, wenzeleku Nzambi, wakamueneka kûdi bawakadi unyema ku mesu kua Esau, mukulu ebe, tshioshelu
Kasala kaadi kadi Debout Congolais
to ne ku
Kuvudi muana mukashi wa muana webe mulume, anyi muana mukashi wa muana webe mukashi bilulu, bobo badi bu wewe mene
Isaka wakalombela mukashi wa ndi Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakadi nkumba, Yehowa wakamunvuila ne Lebeka wakimita difu
Yeye wakadimusha Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima; bualu bua wewe neulue ne Bena Isalele mu buloba bunakabalaya; meme nengikale n ebe
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Gêshona ku meku abo Libini ne Shimei

Bena Ejipitu bakabalonda ne tubalu dionso ne makalu onso bia Palô Masalayi andi ne bantu ba ha nyima ha tubalu bakabaheta hakadibo bashikama hehi ne mai manene, hehi ne Pi hahilota ku mpala kua Bâla sefona
Yeye wakamba ne, Mulangala
Ekesode Mabue a Mikenji Mafundibue Tshiakabidi Dut
Nenteke lukuna hankatshi hebe ne mukashi, ne hankatshi ha bana bebe ne bana bandi, muana wa mukashi neakukume ku mutu kuebe, ne wewe neumusume ku tshikankanyi tshiandi
Nomba Bena Isalele Badi Batombokela Yehowa Bantu ba mu tshisumbu tshionso bakela dî diabo bikole, bakadila butuku abu
Binuandomba bintu bia dibaka bidi bitamba bungi, nennuhebi, anjai kumpa nsongaka shi bu mukashi wanyi

Nguvenela ne tshindonda tshienda badi babasungula bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itanu tshidibo mwa kwambulula musangu umwe kudi batshipwita ba mu polovensa munkatshi anyi pambelu pa Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Nunku mashi andi adi ashala ha bilamba bienu
Biasueye kumuhikula, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu ha mushinga wandi
Hakabuela Mose mu tshitendelelu, difutu diakahueka, diakimana ku mbelu kua Ntenta ne Yehowa wakayikila ne Mose
Njila wa : Bidi bitangila Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima ne bilwilu
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya tunkanunuina tua Sheme Hakadi Shema ne bidimu lukama, wakalela Âpakashada, bidimu bibidi ku nyima kua nvula munene

Biahikula Muena Lewi nsubu, nunku nsubu wakahanabo ne musoko wa buhianyi buandi nebihingane kudibo halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, bualu bua nsubu ya mu misoko ya Bena Lewi idi buhianyi buabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Nunku nutumikile mikenji ne malu ne mei binakunuambila lelu, nubienze
Nsongalume Muena Ebelu, mukuatshishi wa kapitene ka masalayi, wakadi n etu mu nsubu wa lukanu, bakamuambila bilota bietu, ne yeye wakatujinguluila muntu tshilota tshiandi muntu tshiota tshiandi
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya bana balumeba Noa Sheme ne Hama ne Yafete, bobo bakalela bana balume ku nyima kua nvula munene

Bintu bidi n abi Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi, nebikale manyi a minda ne musenga wa manananshi, ne mulambu wa bukula, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutuyeye udi mulami wa nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu bionso bidimu, ne wa muaba wa tshijila ne bintu bionso bidimu
Wewe newangate tshimpanga tshia tshijila, ulambe munyinyi watshi ne mai a kahia mu muaba wa tshijila

Wewe newangate mashi adi ha tshioshelu, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ubimiamine Alona, ha bilulu biandi ne ha bana bandi balume ne ha bilulu biabo, yeye ne bilulu biandi ne bana bandi balume ne bilulu biabo nebikale bijidibue
Yeye wakangata manteke ne mabele ne lukungulu lua ngombe luakalambabo, wakabiteka ku mpala kuabo
Hakadi Noa ne bidimu nkama itanu, Noa wakalela Shema, Hama ne Yafete
Genese Yosefe wakadiela ha mpala wa tatu wandi, wakadila, wakatuangana n andi mishiku
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ulue biebe ne tshisamba tshia Lewi, ubateke ku mpala kua Alona muakuidi, bua bobo bamuenzele mudimu
Mose wakashimika nsubu, wakalongolola nkanu ne mabaya, wakabueshamu mitshi, wakajadika makunshi a nsubu
Hakatantamaneye bikole nunku, muleleshi wakamuambila ne, Kutshinyi, bualu bua wewe neulele muana wa balume mukuabo
Noa wakanua nvinyo, wakakuatshika nvinyo, wakalala mu ntenta wandi butaka

Mose wakamba ne, Mona, nengumuke kûdi, nendombe Yehowa ne yeye neamushe bisumbu bia tuishi kudi Palô ne kudi bena mudimu bandi ne kudi bantu bandi makelela, kadi Palô katu dingi kabidi bua kulekela bantu baye kushihela Yehowa nyama
lupetu lwa mbulamatadi mu polovensa;
Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bidi bibweela nanku mu Tshisangilu ne bukookeshi bujima
Kuitabusha bua yeye kuikala bu muntu mufue udi ne tshituha tshia mubidi mubole hamulelabo

Kanungu ka Muntu nansha umwe keena mwa kufila mpala ku masungula a beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga padiye kêna ukumbaja mikenji idi ilonda eyi: kwikala mweena Kongu; kwikala ne mvula ya tshileledi kayiyi mishadila ku , kwikala ne bujima bwa makookeshi a bumuntu ne a tshidiidi; kubeenga kubwelakana mu maalu adibo babeenga kudi dîyi dia masungulangana
Isaka wakumbula kabidi mena a mai akimbabo mu matuku a tatu wandi Abalahama, bualu bua Bena Peleshete bakelamu buloba bakafua Abalahama, Isaka wakayidika mena akidika Abalahama

Hashika matuku a kudilengesha kuandi, nansha matuku a muana wa balume nansha a muana wa bakashi, yeye nealue ne muana wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mputu nyunyu anyi nyunyu wa nkutshi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena, kudi muakuidi, ne yeye neayifile ku mpala kua Yehowa, bua kumubuikidila n au bubi; yeye neikale mulengeshibue kudi mashi andi

Nunku hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu, ne hanuaheta dikisha mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hashishe nenujimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu; kanuhu muoyo bua bualu ebu nansha
Yeye wakaluhuka kudi Palo, wakalomba Yehowa

Mishindu ya dilondolola eyi idi yenzeka mu makanyika mafila kudi mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu ne ifikisha, pikalabio bieenzeka, ku mukanda wa didiombola anyi wa ditangilula, mu lungenyi lwa tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi
Bantu bakadi babi ku mesu kua Nzambi ne buloba buakadi bûle tente ne malu mabi
Bobo bakalua ne bintu biakamba Mose ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bantu bonso bakalua ha buihi, bakimana ku mpala kua Yehowa
Kanuena bamanye ne muntu bu meme udi mua kutempa matempu, anyi
Enza mbote makumi atanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mesu a mbote ku mibangu ya tshilulu tshikuabo bualu bua kutuangasha bilulu, bua ntenta ikale bu tshilulu tshimue
Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua nuenu kanuikadi bahika babo, nakatshibula mitshi ya tshikokedi yakatekabo ha nshingu yenu, nakanujalamisha
Tuakamuandamuna di ne, Tuakulota bilota, ne kakuena muntu udi mua kutujinguluilabi
Bualu bua yeye wakatuhana, wakatudila bintu bietu bionso
Miselayima wakalela Ludima ne Anamima ne Lehabima ne Nafetuhima ne Patalusima ne Bena Kasaluha nkambua wa Bena Peleshete ne Bena Kafetô
Kanutetshi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munda bu munuakamuteta mu Masa
Palô wakabikila bena meji ne bena muhongo ne bena bilengulengu ba mu Ejipitu, bakenza muomumue ne manga abo
Nunku wambile Bena Isalele ne, Ndi Yehowa, ne meme nennuhatule muinshi mua majitu a Bena Ejipitu, nennusungile ku buhika buabo, nennuhikule ne diboko diolola ne dilumbulula dikole
Ada wakalelela Esau Elifasa ne Basemata wakalela Luele, Oholibama wakalela Yeusha ne Yalama ne Kola
Abalama wakatahulula bantu bandi, wakatuangana n abo butuku, yeye ne bahika bandi bakabatamba bukole, wakabihata to ne ku Hoba, udi ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia Damaseke

MUTU WA MUKANDA MWINÂYI IV: Bidi bitangila polovensa Tshitupa tshia kumpala : Bidi bitangila bishimikidi bia polovensa Kanungu ka Bishimikidi bia polovensa mbiôbi ebi: a Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa b Bukalenga bwa mu polovensa
Nyemenamu lubilu, bualu bua tshiena mua kuenza bualu wewe kuyi muanze kufikaku
Kanungu ka Bampulushi ba ditunga dijima badi bakookela bamfumu badi kabayi basalayi ba mwaba udibo benzela mudimu ne badi ku dîyi dia minisitila mwimikila mianda ya munda wa ditunga

Nenufume ku nsubu yenu ne mitanda ya mampa ibidi ya kunyukula, milamba ne bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne luevene, ebi mbintu bihuola bia diambedi bifila kudi Yehowa
Argent yetu yakushika
Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga tshi mu polovensa
Ditangilula dia Dîyi dikulu diônso didi dipatshila anyi difikisha ku dikepeesha dia makookesha ne madilekelela a muntu, anyi kudikepeesha dia makookeshi a polovensa ne misoko didi dikandikibwa
Bualu bua difutu dia Yehowa diakadi ha mutu ha nsubu mu munya, ne mu butuku kahia kakadihu, ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso mu ngendu yabo yonso
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Ahila muana mulume wa Enana
Bintu bionso bidi muntu udi kayi muakane ulenga bianza nebikale bu bintu bidi kabiyi biakane, ne muntu udi ubilenga tshianza neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô ne ku dilolo
Kadi Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi
Yehowa wakaha bantu dikasa dimpe ku mesu kua Bena Ejipitu, bakabaka bintu biakabalombabo Bakahaula Bena Ejipitu

Ubueshe mabue a Ulima ne Tumima mu masoso a mu tshilulu tshia dilumbulula tshia ha tshiadi, a neikale ha mutshima wa Alona hayeye ku mpala kua Yehowa, Alona neatuale kulumbulula kua malu a Bena Isalele ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku onso

Kuhungi tshihungidi ne bena buloba; hendabo masandi ne mpingu yabo, ne hashihelabo nzambi yabo nyama, hakubikilabo bua kudia n abo munyinyi wa nyama mishiha; bua nuenu kanubikidi bana babo ba bakashi kudi bana benu ba balume; ne bana babo ba bakashi badi benda masandi ku mpingu yabo ka benzeshi bana benu ba balume masandi kudi mpingu yabo
Mona, bantu aba badi bahika bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, yeye udi ubika bu nyama wa ntambue, yeye kena ulala kabidi to ne hadieye tshintu, ne hanueye mashi a tshintu tshiakashiheye
Yosefe wakamona bana babo, wakabamanya, kadi yeye wakadivuisha bu muntu mukuabo kudibo, wakabambila mei makole, wakabakonka ne, Nuakufuma kudi kunyi
Kakuena bia kudia, kakuena mai, ne bidia ebi bia tshianana biakututonda

Sheta wakikala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne bitanu, wakalela Enosha Ku nyima kua kulela kua Enosha, Sheta wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne muanda mutekete, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi Matuku onso a Sheta akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne dikumi ne bibidi, yeye wakafua biandi
Kanungu ka Beena Kongo bônso badi ne bukookeshi bwa kusanka ne bumpianyi bwabo bônso bwa bumuntu
Wewe neujidile tshiadi tshidibo banyukula, ne tshihela tshidibo babisha mulu tshia tshimpanga tshia kujidila kua Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume
Nunku tangildi, mesu enu adi amona bu mudi mesu a muakuny anyi Benyamina amona ne, Mukana muanyi mudi munuambila malu au
Nunku buloba nebuikale ne bidimu bia kubanda, nebuikale hatuhu hanuikala mu buloba bua bantu badi n enu lukuna buloba buenu nebuikale mua kubanda
Kanuangatshi bintu bia buhikudi kudi muntu wakasemena ku musoko wa kunyemena, bualu bua kumuhingisha ku buloba buandi to ne hafua muakuidi munene
Hakashikisha Mose kusomba n abo, yeye wakateka tshilulu tshikudika ha mpala handi
Kanubueshakanyi bimuna bienu, kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mu budimi bumue, kanuluatshi bilulu bikuma ne munda mashilangane
Nunku mukelenge wa Edome wakahidia bua Bena Isalele bahite butshika buandi, nunku Bena Isalele bakasesuka kuakadiye

Efelona wakadi ushikama munkatshi mua bana ba Hete, ne Efelona, Muena Hiti wakambila Abalahama ku mpala kua bana ba Hete bonso mene bakadi babuela mu musoko wandi ne, Nansha, mukelenge, ungunvuile nenkuhe budimi ne lubuebue bidimu, nenkuhebi ku mpala kua bana ba bantu banyi, ujikemu tshitalu etshi
Utusumbe bietu ne buloba buetu kabidi ku bia kudia ne tuetu ne buloba buetu netuikale bahika ba Palo, utuhe bia kudia, tuikale ne muoyo, katufu, ne buloba kabushadi hatuhu

Muntu webe, tatu wetu wakabambila ne, Nudi bamanye ne mukashi wanyi wakundelela bana balume babidi, umue wabo wakumuka kundi, nakamba ne, Nyama mubi wakamuhandulula, ne ku dituku adi tshiakamutangila kabidi, binumusha muana eu mukuabo kundi, ne biakuatshishibueye bualu bubi, nennubueshe nsuki yanyi mitoke to mu Muaba wa Bafue ne kanyinganyinga kakole Nunku hanaya kudi muntu webe, tatu wanyi, ne nsongalume eu kayi n etu, bualu bua muoyo wandi udi musuikakana ne muoyo wa nsongalume eu, hashishe, hatangileye ne nsongalume kena n etu, yeye neafue, ne tuetu, bantu bebe, netubueshe nsuki ya muntu webe, tatu wetu, mu Muaba wa Bafue ne kanyinganyinga kakole
Nzambi wakambila Noa ne, Kunshikidilu kua bantu bonso kuakufika ku mpala kuanyi bualu bua buloba budi bûle tente ne mayoyo bualu buabo, mona, nembajimishe ne buloba hamue
Mpunda wakatangila muanjelo wa Yehowa, wakalala hanshi muinshi mua Belâma, tshiji tshiakakuata Belâma, wakakuma mpunda ne mulangala wandi
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue buakadi coudées makumi asatu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées anai bilulu dikumi ne tshimue biakadi ne luidi lumue
Meme ndi mua kudisha bantu aba bonso munyinyi kudi kunyi
Ebu mbuloba bua Bena Lefa
Bakidika dina dia muaba au ne, Masa ne Meliba, bualu bua kutontolola kua Bena Isalele ne bualu bua bakatela Yehowa ne, Yehowa udi munkatshi muetu, anyi
Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi Nzambi wa nzambi mikuabo, udi Mukelenge wa bakelenge, Nzambi munene ne mukole, udibo batshina, yeye katu watangila bantu ne kansungusungu, kena witabusha matutu

Yehowa Udi Witabusha bua Mose Atangile Buloba bua Kanâna Yehowa wakambila Mose dituku adi mene ne, Banda biebe mukuna eu wa Abalima, ku mutu kua mukuna wa Nebo, udi buludiludi ne Yeleko mu buloba bua Moaba, utangile buloba bua Kanâna bundi mpa Bena Isalele bu buhianyi buabo; afue biebe ku mukuna ûdi ubanda, usangishibue kudi bankambua bebe, bu muakafua Alona, mukulu webe, ku mukuna wa Hô, wakasangishibua kudi bankambua bandi: bualu bua wewe wakahidia dî dianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele ku mai a Meliba a mu Kadesha mu tshihela tshia Sina; bualu bua wewe kuakanjidila munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Enza mabaya asambombo a kutoka ku wesete ku luseke lua ku nyima
Mulau wa Tuishi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubike ne dinda dionso, uye kudi Palô hayeye ku mai, umuambile ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuntendelela
Bakumuka mu Elima bakashikama hehi ne Dishiba Dikunze

Nudimuke bienu, kanuhu muoyo bua tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiakahungeye n enu: kanudisongidi luhingu anyi tshifuanyikishi tshia tshintu tshimue tshiakanuhidisha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi bu kahia kadi kashidisha bionso, udi Nzambi wa mukau
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Tshiena ne bualu bua kudimuka bua kuamba dî diakuteka Yehowa mukana muanyi, anyi

Balume bakuabo bakadiku bakadi banyanguke kudi mubidi wa mundi mufue, kabakamanya mua kuvuluka kuhita kua Yehowa dituku adi, bakatua ku mpala kua Mose ne Alona dituku adi, balume aba bakamuambila ne, Tudi banyanguke bua mubidi wa mundi mufue, bualu kai didi bikandibua bua tuetu katuena mua kufila mulambu wa Yehowa mu tshikondo tshiau munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Halana wakafua hakadi tatu wandi Tela ne muoyo mu buloba buakakulelabo bua Ula wa Bena Kasada
Matuku onso a Mahalelela akadi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi tshitema ne bitanu, yeye wakafua biandi

Hanuafila mulambu wa tshimpanga, nenulongolole tshintu tshitanu tshia bukula bubotesha busangisha ne tshituha tshisatu tshia dikoho dia manyi, ne tshituha tshisatu tshia nvinyo bu mulambu udibo banua bua kûtuisha dihembu kudi Yehowa
Abalama wakadi muikale ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombo, hakamulelela Haga Yishemaele
Udi kabidi ne tshia kufuta bitadi biende
Binuatangila nansha mpunda nansha ngombe bia mukuenu biakahona hanshi mu nshila, kanubisokoki, kadi numukuatshishe bua kubibisha kabidi
Yeye wakatshimanya wakamba ne, Etshi ntshikowelu tshia muan anyi, nyama mubi wakamudia, bulelela, Yosefe udi muhandibue bihese bihese kudi nyama
Hanuamana kusabuka Yadene, nenjadike mabue au mu mukuna wa Ebala, nenuashinguile ne nshimete, bu mundi nnuambila lelu
Difutu diakadi hankatshi ha Bena Ejipitu ne Bena Isalele, difutu ne midima biakadiku kadi diakadi ne dinkenke butuku Kabikadianganyi ha buihi to butuku buonso
Bakumuka mu Tela bakashikama mu Miteka

Yehowa Udi Ubenga bua Mose Abuele mu Buloba bua Kanâna Nakasengelela Yehowa ku tshikondo atshi, nakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, wewe wakabanga kulesha muntu webe bunene buebe, ne tshianza tshiebe tshikole: nzambi kai udi mu diulu anyi udi ha buloba udi mua kuenza bu mûdi wenza malu ebe a kukema
Teka bidia bilesha ha mesa au matuku onso ku mpala kuanyi
Genese Yakoba Udi Ukuatshila Labana Mudimu bua Kuheteye Lakele ne Lea Yakoba wakaya ku luendu luandi wakateka ku buloba bua bantu ba ku esete

Eu mmudimu wa meku a Bena Gêshona udibo benza ne majitu adibo batuala nebabidie bilulu bidi binyunguluka nsubu wa tshitendelu, ne ntenta mene wa kusambakena, ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu, ne tshibuikidi tshia biseba bia nkonge tshidi ha mutu hatshi, ne tshilulu tshidi ku mbelu kua nsubu, ne bilulu bia ku luhangu, ne tshilulu tshidi ku tshibi tshia luhangu tshidi hehi ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu tshidi tshinyunguluka tshioshelu tshia kahia, ne nshinga ya ku luhangu, ne bintu bionso bidibo benza n abi mudimu, bobo nebenze mudimu eu

Bikala tshilumbu tshinuhite bukole, nansha hankatshi ha bashihianganyi, nansha hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu badi badiakuilangana, nansha hankatshi ha muntu ne muntu badi batutangana, mmalu adibo batandangana n au mu misoko yenu; hashishe nenubike, nenuye ku muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nenulue kudi bakuidi, Bena Lewi, ne kudi mulumbuluishi munene wa mu matuku au; nenubakonke, ne bobo nebanukosele tshilumbu
Binuamba mei malelela, nuitabushe bua: umue wenu ashale musuikibue mu nsubi wa lukanu, kadi bakuabo benu baye kuenu ne bia kudia bualu bua tshiole tshidi mu nsubu yenu

Nomba Milambu Yakafilabo bua Kujidila Tshioshelu Hakalua dituku diakashikisha Mose kushimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne hakeleye manyi ha mutu hatshi, wakatshijidila, ne bintu bionso biakadimu ne tshioshelu ne malonga atshi onso, ne hakeleye manyi ha mutu habi, wakabijidila
Nadaba ne Abihu bakafua hakafuabo kahia kakadi kakayi ka tshijila kudi Yehowa
Wakosha munyinyi ne tshiseba ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Hakunvueye di dianyi, yeye wakashiya tshivualu tshiandi kundi, wakanyema, wakahatuka
Au adi mai a Meliba, bualu bua Bena Isalele bakatanda ne Yehowa, ne yeye wakajidibua ku mesu kuabo
Nenuhe Bena Lewi misoko ei isambombo ya kunyemena, biashala muntu muntu mukuabo, yeye neanyemenemu; ha mutu ha misoko ei nenubahe misoko mikuabo makumi anai ne ibidi
Mukuna wa Sinai wonso wakadi ne muishi, bualu bua Yehowa wakahueka ha mutu hau mu kahia, muishi wakabanda bu muishi wa tshikutu, mukuna wonso wakakanka bikole
Nzambi wakamba ne, Monai, nakanuha midioko yonso ya ha buloba idi yela ntete, ne mitshi yonso idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete munda, bua kuikalabi bia kudia bienu
Abimeleke wakangata mikoko ne ngombe ne bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, wakabifila kudi Abalahama, wakahingasha Sala mukashi wandi kudiye kabidi

Beena Bukalenga bwa polovensa badi mwa kubumbusha ku mudimu mu tshibûngi anyi ku muntu ku muntu pa nkayenda, pikala dilomba dia ditangilula anyi dia didiombola difila kudi Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa ditabijibwe
Hakatshia butuku Yakoba wakamona ne Lea wakambila Labana ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi munyi
Ku nyima kua malu au Abalahama wakajika Sala, mukashi wandi, mu lubuebue biakadi mu budimi bua Makepela ku mpala kua Mamale eu udi Hebelone mu buloba bua Kanâna
Yakoba wakashala ku nyima nkayandi muntu wakaluangana n andi bibula to ne hakatshia butuku
BIDI BITANGILA MAPA A MUNTU YÖNSO, MADIKADIDI A NSHINDAMEENU NE MAKANYIKA A MWEENA MWAABO NE A MBULAMATADI
Hanuakuna matamba a mitshi yenu ya olive bua mamuma ahone, kanuakumi tshiakabidi; neashale a benyi ne a bana ba nshiya ne a bakashi ba mu lufuila
Yeye wakafunda ha mabue abidi, wakampau
Mai akahingana, akabanda ha mutu ha makalu ne ha mutu ha masalayi akadi enda ha tubalu, ha mutu ha bisumbu bionso bia Palô, biakabalonda mu bunene bua mai, nansha umue wabo wakahandika
Bantu ba mu maloba onso bakalua mu Ejipitu kudi Yosefe bua kusumbabo bia kudia, bualu bua tshiole tshiakadi tshikole mu maloba onso

Yehowa kakateka luse luandi kunudi, kakanusungula bualu bua nuenu nuakahita bantu bakuabo bungi; nuenu nuakatamba bantu bonso bukese; kadi bualu bua Yehowa udi munusue ne bualu bua yeye utu watumikila mulayi wakalayeye batatu benu, Yehowa wakanuhatula ne tshianza tshikole, wakanuhikula mu nsubu wa lukanu, ne mu tshianza tshia Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu
Bakashi bonso bakadi ne lungenyi lule bakakuma bilulu ne bianza biabo, bakalua ne bilulu biakakumabo ne bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin muimpe
Enza minda muanda mutekete, bualu bua kutemenayi muaba udi ku mpala kua tshitekelu
Yehowa wakakonka Kana ne, Muakuny ebe Ebele udi kudi kunyi
Ei mmikenji yakelela Yehowa Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, kakunyua mei a Belâma; kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakakudimuna mulau ulua disanka dienu, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusua

Muntu yonso udi ne lungenyi lule alue biandi bua kuenza bi ntu bionso biakunuambila Yehowa ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne tshilulu tshia ha mutu, ne nkanu yatshi ne mabaya atshi, ne mitshi yatshi ne makurishi atshi ne nkanu ya ku makunshi, ne mushete ne mitshi ya mushete, ne tshibuikilu tshia mushete, ne tshilulu tshia munkatshi mua tshitendelelu, ne mesa ne mitshi ya mesa ne malonga a mesa ne bidia bia ha mesa, ne tshitekelu tshia minda ne malonga atshi ne minda yatshi, ne manyi a muinda, ne tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi, ne mitshi yatshi, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne manananshi adi atua dihembu dimpe, ne tshilulu tshia ha mbelu ha tshitendelelu, ne tshioshelu tshia kahia ne bintu bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne mitshi yatshi ne malonga atshi, ne tshiowelu ne mesa atshi, ne bilulu bia ku luhangu ne makunshi a luhangu, ne nkanu ya ku makunshi ne tshilulu tshia ha mbelu ha luhangu, ne milondo ya mu tshitendelelu ne ya mu luhangu ne nshinga yai, ne bilulu bia mushinga mukole bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu muaba wa tshijila, bilulu bia tshijila bia muakuidi
Nzambi wakambila Noa ne bana bandi balume ne, Meme bianyi ndi njadika tshihungidi tshianyi n enu ne bana benu badi banulonda
Biashala bidimu bikese tô ne ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, bobo nebabibale, yeye neamuhingishile tshituha tshia kudihikula n atshi bu bungi bua bidimu biandi bidi bishala
Hakatshiabu, bakashikama Mose bua kulumbuluila bantu bilumbu, bantu bakimana ku mpala kua Mose dinda tô ne ku dilolo

Tuakanyenga buloba mu bianza bia bakelenge babidi bakadi dishiya dia Yadene, ku tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Hêmona; Bena Sidona badi babikila Hêmona ne, Sileona, ne Bena Amole badi babikila Hêmona ne, Senî; misoko yonso ya mu mpata, ne misoko yonso ya mu Gilada, ne ya mu Bashana tô ne ku Saleka ne Edelei, misoko ya bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana

Adi apeta bwenzeji dîba didibo baapatula ne adi ajimija bukola bwawu padi tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia dianyisha katshiyi tshifidibwa ku Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga padiku njingakanyi mu dituku dia ndekeelu didibo bateeka kudi dîyi difidi dia bukookeshi
Ne bikala bualu bukufikishe munda, meme nempingane kabidi
Dibolesha diônso anyi dinyangakaja diônso didi difuma ku mianda ya bubanji didi anu difikisha ku dikumbajija ne anyi ku dilongolola
Bulongolodi budibo bâmba ne kabweena bukumbanangana kabeena babulonda to
Mitshi yenu ne bintu bienu bionso bidi bidiunda mu buloba nebikale bia mikumbi

Nuenu nenufue munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabo, ne buloba bua bantu badi n enu lukuna nebunumine Bantu benu badi bashala nebanyingalale ne makenga a mibi yabo mu buloba bua bantu badi n enu lukuna, nebanyingalale ne makenga a mibi ya batatu abo kabidi

Nenusanke ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muntu webe mulume ne muntu webe mukashi ne Muena Lewi udi mu musoko webe ne muenyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila badi munkatshi muenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, Usungula bua kujadikamu dina diandi
Nenuikale ne milau mu misoko, nenuikale ne milau mu madimi
Bikala muenyi munkatshi muenu udi musue kuvuluka kuhita kua Yehowa, yeye nênze bu mudi mikenji ya kuhita kua Yehowa, nenuikale ne mukenji umue kudi muenyi ne kudi muntu mulela munkatshi muenu

Kanungu ka Mweenyi yônso udi usanganyibwa mu bulaba bwa ditunga bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu, badi ne tshia kumukuba mushindu umwe udibo bakuba bantu ne bintu biaabo, bilondeshila bulongolodi bwenza mu ndondo ne mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga
Bakafika ku muaba wakamua mbila Nzambi, ne Abalahama wake nza tshioshelu, wakalongolola nkunyi, wakasuika muan andi Isaka, wakamuladika ha tshioshelu ha mutu ha nkunyi
Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Lubena ku luseke lua ku sude
Biatangila muakuidi ne miosa mitoke tô kayena mu muaba au mutoke, ne disama kadiena dibuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, muakuidi neamubueshe ha nkayandi mu nsubu matuku muanda mutekete
Baminisitila ba mu polovensa badi babangata kudi nguvenêla munda anyi pambelu pa Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Kadi kalongolola diangata ku mudimu, dibandisha miânzu ne diipata dia balumbulwishi ku mudimu

Bamfumu ba mbulamatadi badi ne tshia kumwangalaja ne kulongesha Dîyi dikulu, Dijadika dia buloba bujima dia mapa a muntu yônso, Bulongolodi bwa beena Aflika butangila mapa a muntu yônso ne a bisamba, pamwe ne ndondo yônso ya munkatshi mwa ditunga ne ya pankatshi pa matunga mikala itangila mapa a muntu yônso ne bukubi bwa muntu yônso pankatshi pa bisamba, ndondo mianyisha mu njila mululame

Bana balume ba Alona bonso nebatshidie, bu tshituha tshiabo mu bikondo biabo bionso munkatshi mua mulambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, muntu yonso udi ulenga bintu ebi tshianza neikale muntu wa tshijila
Tuhita tua Palô tuakakuma bantu bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele, tuakamba ne, Bualu kai kanuena nushikisha mudimu wenu ne makelela ne lelu bu munuakenza diambedi
Bûngi bwa batshipwita ba mu polovensa bateeka amu nanku mu diumvwangana kabweena mwa kupita pa tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia bûngi bwa beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshia polovensa
Biwenza nunku, ne Bikala Nzambi numuambile dî diandi nunku, wewe neumanye mua kuikala ne bukole ne bantu nebaye ku miaba yabo talalâ
Bana ba balume ba Geshona: Libini ne Shimei, ku meku abo
Hakaluabo n andi, yeye wakatumina tatu andi muenu dî ne, Nakimita difu kudi muena bintu ebi, ujingulule nfumu wa bintu ebi, kakanu ka ku munu, ne mionshi ya ku maboko ne tshibangu
