Esau wakamona hakasankisha Isaka Yakoba ne hakamutumeye ku Padana alama bua kuangateye mu kashi kuakua, ne bu muakamuvudishila Isaka disanka ne muakamudimusheye ne, Kudiangatshidi mu kashi wa bana ba bakashi ba Bena Kanana ne bu muakatumikila Yakoba di dia tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne bû muakayeye ku Padana alama

Au mmena a bakelenge aba: wa tshisamba tshia Yuda, Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune; wa tshisamba tshia Shimeona, Shemuele, muana mulume wa Amihuda, wa tshisamba tshia Benyamina, Elidada, muana mulume wa Kiliona, wa tshisamba tshia Dana, Buki, muana mulume wa Yogeli, wa tshisamba tshia Yosefe tshisamba tshia Manashe, Haniele, muana mulume wa Efoda, wa tshisamba tshia Efelayima, Kemuele, muana mulume wa Shifetana, wa tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Elisafana, muana mulume wa Pânaka, wa tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Palatiele, muana mulume wa Azana, wa tshisamba tshia Ashê, Ahihuda, muana mulume wa Shelomi, wa tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Pedahele, muana mulume wa Amihuda
Udi ne tshia kukuba bumpianyi bwa bankambwa bwa ditunga ne kabidi udi ne tshia kubutantshisha
Palô wakanyunguluka, wakaya mu nsubu wandi, kakateka bualu ebu mu mutshima wandi
Udi ne bukookeshi bwa kufuta mabanza pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia ditunga
Ba ha mutu habo nebambile bantu mei makuabo kabidi ne, Nganyi udi ne ditshina ne mutshima mutekete

Kadi biahidiabo ditalala, ne bialuanganabo n enu, hashishe nenubatshintshimike; ne hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu aba mu bianza bienu, nenushihe balume bonso ne miele ya nvita; kadi bakashi ne bana bakese ne bimuna ne bintu bionso bia mu musoko, nenudiangatshile ebi; nuenu nenudie bintu bionso bia badi n enu lukuna, bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe
Udimuke, kuhungi tshihungidi ne bantu ba mu buloba bûdi uya; bualu ebu kabulu buteyi munkatshi muenu
Palô wakatuma di, wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakabambila ne, Nakuenza bualu bubi musangu eu, Yehowa udi muakane ne meme ne bantu banyi tudi bantu babi
Mose wakabika ne Yoshua mukuatshishi wandi, Mose wakabanda mu mukuna wa Nzambi

Bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakasungulabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumuenzelabo mudimu ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina dia Yehowa, nebalue ha buihi: bua mei abo malu onso ne bilumbu bionso bia kukumangana nebijalame
Kanubeyi nsuki yenu biketu, kanuhungi miedi yenu ku bihanga
Nunku bantu bakadi bamuangalaka buloba bua Ejipitu buonso bua kukeba bisonsa
Meme nakadimusha balumbuluishi benu tshikondo atshi ne, Unvuai bilumbu bia bana benu, nulumbulule bilumbu bia muntu ne muan abo mulume ne muenyi udi n andi biakane
Biwikala ne mukashi wa ngombe anyi wa mukoko, kumushihi ne muana wandi dituku dimue
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele mei au onso, ne mitshima yabo yakanyingalala bikole
Yeye wakateka tshivualu tshia Yosefe hanshi to ne hakahingana mukelenge wandi ku nsubu wandi
Kanuitabushi mulambu ei ku bianza bia benyi bua kuyifila kudi Nzambi wenu, mulambu ei idi ne bilema, tshiena nyitabusha bualu bua idi munyanguke
Au mmena a balume badi mua kuimana n enu
Alona wakambila Mose ne, Mukelenge wanyi, kuteki bualu bubi kutudi, bualu bua tuetu tuakuenza buhote, tuakuenza bualu bubi
Tshipwita mukulumpa udi uleeja mpala wa polovensa, kadi udi ne bukookeshi bwa ditunga dijima

Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi, mudi dipangila dia ditunga pikala Mulombodi wa Ditunga mudiâta Dîyi dikulu ku makasa mu budiswila bwenda anyi pikalabo bajadika ne yêye ne Minisitila kavulambedi, badi bênza, bênza pamwe anyi bambulwisha bakwabo mu didiata ku makasa dinene ne kadiyi kwela mpata dia Mapa a muntu yônso, anyi mu diabanyina beenyi tshitupa tshia bulaba bwa ditunga
Isaka wakumukaku, wakashimika ntenta yandi mu tshibanda tshia Gelâ, wakashikamamu

Kadi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, wakahidia bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanyengabasha meji andi, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, bualu bua kumufila mu tshianza tshienu, bu muakenzeye lelu
Ubiteke mu tshisaka tshimue, ulue n abi mu tshisaka ne muana wa ngombe ne bimpanga bibidi
Bena Isalele bakashala mu Ejipitu bidimu nkama mai ne makumi asatu

Bikala muntu kayi ne muan abo wa kumuhingishila bintu bia bubi buandi, bintu bidiye uhingisha bia kudilengesha n abi munda kudi Yehowa nebikale bintu bia muakuidi, ha mutu ha mulambu wa tshimpanga udiye ufila bua kudibuikila n au bubi buandi
Butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka kudibo
Tuakabajimisba, bu munuakenzela Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona; tuakahaula misoko yonso yakadi ne bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese
Mesu a Isalele akadi bileshileshi bualu bua bununu buandi, yeye kakamanya mua kumona bimpe Yeye wakalua n abo ha buihi n andi, yeye wakatuangana n abo mishiku, wakabuhukila
Kanudionyi ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, kanudienzedi bibi ne bintu bidi ne bukoya, kanudinyangi ne bintu ebi
Belâma wakabika dinda, wakambila miloho ya Balaka ne, Yai bienu ku buloba buenu, Yehowa wakahidia bua meme kuya n enu
Gamaliele, muana mulume wa Pedasû, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Gadadiele, muana mulume wa Sodi
Kadi mbushi wakakuatabo kudi nshobo wa Azazele neamuteke ne muoyo ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kubuikila n andi bubi bua bantu, ne bua kumuihatshilabo bua Azazele mu tshihela

Yakoba wakambila Shimeona ne Lewi ne, Nuenu nuakuntatshisha, nuakunvuisha bu tshintu tshibi munkatshi mua bena buloba munkatshi mua Bena Kanana ne Bena Pelese, tuetu tudi bakehe ne bobo nebunguile kundi, nebanshihe, nebahaule nsubu wanyi ne meme nenjimishibue
Bena Isalele bonso nebunvue lumu elu, nebatshine, kabena benza bualu ebu bubi kabidi munkatshi muenu
Bu mudibio nanku, pa kulonda bimanyinu bia tshikondo tshieetu, Dîyi dikulu dia lelu edi didi dipatula mwanda mupiamupia pa kuleeja dikala dia momumwe dia mulume ne mukaji
Muleleshi wakamba ne, Mona tshihatukidi tshiwakuhatuka

Alona wakangata dilonga diandi bu muakamba Mose, wakaya lubilu munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia bantu, ne monai, disama dikole diakamana kubanga munkatshi mua bantu, yeye wakatekahu musenga wa manananshi bua kubuikidila bantu bubi buabo
Ushimike luhangu lua tshilulu lunyunguluke, ukudike tshilulu tshia ku mbelu kua luhangu

Yeye wakahuka kudiye hakadiye mu nshila, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Lua biebe, ndi musue kulala n ebe, yeye kakamanya ne yeye udi ma muen andi Mukashi wakamukonka ne, Neumpe tshinyi hawalua kundi

Muntu yonso aditekele kakasu mu bintu biandi bia nvita, ne hayeye mu tshisuku, neaumbule dina, neahingashe buloba ha mutu ha bintu biakahuyeye; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi wendakana munkatshi mua tshitudilu bua kunusungila, ne bua kufila badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu; nunku tshitudilu netshikale tshia tshijila
Tshiôtshi etshi tshidi tshianji kulekela ditangila dia tshilumbu etshi ne tshidi tshimanyisha Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu, mianda yônso mimanyika
Nealuate tshikowelu tshia ku ne mihanu ya lin, nêle mukaba wa lin ku tshimono tshiandi, nease tshifufu tshia lin ku mutu ebi mbilulu bia tshijila, yeye neowe mai, neabiluate
Eu udi mukenji wa hafuila mundi mu ntenta mundi yonso udi ubuela mu ntenta au, ne mundi yonso wakadi mu ntenta au neikale bu mundi udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete

Tshiseba tshia muana wa ngombe ne munyinyi wandi wonso ne mutu wandi ne bioku biandi ne bintu bia munda ne tuma tuandi ne mubidi wandi mujima, neabituale ku butshika bua tshitudilu ku muaba muteke kudibo bela butue, neabioshe ha nkunyi ne kahia, yeye neabioshile kudibo bela butue
Mulau wa Mashi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mutshima wa Palô udi ne tshitshu, yeye udi uhidia kulekela bantu
Malu Adi Nzambi Ulomba Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi musue nuenu nuenze malu kai
Lufu ne Kujikibua bia Abalahama Â adi matuku a bidimu bia Abalahama, biakadi lukama ne makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuihatshile bisamba abi ku mpala kuenu bituha bituha: kanubashihi tshikondo tshimue, bualu bua nyama ya muitu neyikumbane munkatshi muenu
Netanele muana mulume wa Sua neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Yisakâ
Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelese bakadi mu buloba tshikondo atshi
Kanubuelakanyi ne bena mulongo anyi batempi ba mbuku, kanubakebi, kunudionyi kudibo meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Nenvuishe muana wa muhika webe tshisabata tshinene bualu bua yeye udi muana webe
Balaka wakamuebesha ne, Yehowa wakuamba tshinyi
Lengesha makunshi onso ne tshiamu tshia argent, ne bitubuidi bia argent ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Mu Luhangu lua Tshitendelelu Ek
Hashishe Yuda wakambila Tama ma mue n andi ne, Ushale bu mukashi wa mu lufuila mu nsubu wa tatu ebe to ne hadiunda muan anyi Shela
Yeye wakambila Yakoba ne, Undekele butuku bukadi ha kutshia
Abalahama ne Yishemaele, muan andi mulume, bakatengudibua dituku dimue
Diambulwisha ku majitu a mbulamatadi didi dikanyika dia muntu yônso udi usanganyibwa mu Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata
Aba mbakelenge bakakokesha ba mu buloba bua Edome, diambedi mukelenge kayi muanze kukokesha Bena Isalele
Yehowa wakunyua mei enu hanuakadi basombe n anyi; ne Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nakunvua mei a bantu aba, akukuambilabo; mei onso akuambabo adi mimpe

Bana balume ba Gada ku meku abo Sefona ne meku a Bena Sefona, Hagi ne meku a Bena Hagi, Shuni ne meku a Bena Shuni, Ozeni ne meku a Bena Ozeni, Eli ne meku a Bena Eli, ne Aloda ne meku a Bena Aloda, ne Aleli ne meku a Bena Aleli

Tela wakangata Abalama, muan andi mulume ne Lota, muana wa Halana, muikulu wandi, ne Salai, ma muen andi, mukashi wa muan andi mulume Abalama, bakamuangala mu buloba bua Ula wa Kasada bua kuya ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika ku Halana, bakashikamaku
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uye biebe ku mpala kua bantu, ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele baye n ebe, angata mulangala webe mu tshianza, uwakakuma n au musulu, ya biebe
Bena Isalele bonso bakadi ha buihi habo bakanyema hakunvuabo muadi wabo, bobo bakamba ne, Buloba kabutuminyi

Yeye wakabûsha mitshima tente ne lungenyi bua kuenza n alu midima yonso ya bantu badi basonga bintu ne badi bakuma bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin, ne ya bantu bonso badi balongolola midimu ya lungenyi

Bakangata tshikowelu tshia Yosefe, bakashiha mbushi, bakina tshikowelu mu mashi, bakatuma tshikowelu tshia maboko male kudi tatu wabo, bakamba ne, Tuakutshisangana hanshi, umanye ne ntshikowelu tshia muan ebe, anyi

dienza dia ndongamu ya mianda ya madimi ne ya meetu ne diilonda bu mudibio mu mikenji ya ndongamu wa ditunga, diteeka dia beena midimu wa budimi, dia beena mudimu bashindame bu mudibio mu bulongolodi bwa mukanda wa beena mudimu bashindame ba mbulamatadi, dilonda dia mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga idi itangila mianda ya madimi, ya meetu, ya ditwa buluwa ne ya diloba pamwe ne ya miaba idi bantu basombela, ya dilamina bia pa buloba ne dikwata dia nyama ya diitu, dilongolola ne dilondesha dia mivu ya bia pa madimi, ditwa dia mishinga ya bia pa madimi;
Etshi ntshintu tshiabo tshiendelele mu bikondo biabo bionso
Kakuena mukashi udi utula difu, kakuena mukashi udi wikala nkumba mu buloba buenu, nenkumbashe bungi bua matuku enu
Sangisha bintu bia ku diabi bionso, nebikale bu bintu bia kudia biebe ne biabi kabidi

Wakatumma tatu wandi bintu nunku, nyama ya mpunda dikumi yakadi ne bujitu bua bintu bimpe bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu ha nyima hai ne nyama ya mpunda mikashi dikumi yakadi ne bujitu bua bintu bia kudia ne bintu bia kukuatshisha n abi tatu andi mu nshila

dilongolola dia mianda ya bisalu bidi bieepula nyama ku masama, dilongolola dia labolatwala, lupitadi ne biondapelu bia tshidiilu tshia nyama pamwe ne dilonda dia meeyi ne mikandu ya ditunga idi itangila mianda ya dikuba dia nyama, dilongolola dia diyisha kumpala dia makanda a mubidi a bangabanga;
Bana babo bakamuambila ne, Wewe newikale mukelenge wetu, anyi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne bana bandi balume ne Bena Isalele bonso ne, Muntu yonso wa mu nsubu ya Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele udi ufila mulambu wa kuditshiha, anyi mulambu udi mutshima wandi musue kufila, anyi mulambu mukuabo udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia, biasueye kufila mulambu udi Yehowa muitabushe, afile mulume udi kayi ne tshialua wa munkatshi mua ngombe anyi mikoko anyi mbushi
Padi tshipungu etshi tshipita, muntu udibo bânji kulama mu tshimana badi ne tshia kumulekela anyi kumwambika kudi bumfumu bukoshi bwa nsambu budi ne bukookeshi abu

Bikala muan enu mulume, muana mulume wa mamu webe mene, anyi muan ebe mulume anyi muan ebe mukashi, anyi mukashi webe ûdi unanga, anyi mulunda webe wa ha mutshima webe, mukusesuishe mu musokoko ne, Tuye bietu, tuenzele nzambi mikuabo mudimu, inudi kanuyi bamanye, nansha wewe nansha batatu benu; nzambi ya bantu badi ha buihi n enu, anyi badi ha bule ku luseke lumue lua buloba tô ne ku luseke lukuabo; kuitabushi, kunvu dî diandi, kumuleshi luse, kumusungidi, kumusokoki; kadi umushihe bulelela; wewe umukuate tshianza bua kumushiha diambedi, ne ku nyima bantu bakuabo bonso nebamukuate

Hakashikisheye kubambila mei a onso, buloba buakahandika muinshi mua makasa abo, buloba buakubulula mukana muabu, buakabamina ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu yabo ne bantu bonso bakalamata Kola ne bintu biabo bionso
Bikala nsuki ya muntu mituke, ne bikaleye muena dibala, yeye udi muakane
Mai manene akakuatakana mu ndondo wa mai
Muntu ne muntu udibo babala wakabita bidimu makumi abidi neafile kuha kua Yehowa
Katataka wewe ubafundile musambu eu, wayisha Bena Isalele bonso musambu; uteke musambu eu mukana muabo, newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi kudi Bena Isalele
Eu mmukenji wa bukoya buandi nansha hahatuka tufina mu mubidi wandi nansha hashalatu mu mubidi tudi anu tubi
Yosefe Mubandishibue bu Muloho wa Bena Ejipitu Bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi bonso

Muntu mukuabo kikadi mu ntenta wa kusangakena hayeye kufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi mu muaba wa tshijila ne bubi bua ba mu nsubu muandi ne bubi bua Bena Isalele, tô ne hahatukeye mu nsubu

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Wakungenzela tshinyi
Hanuafika mu buloba bulualua Yehowa kunuha, bu muakalayeye, nuenze tshilele etshi
Mukàjì kayi mutamba bakwabu Utena yeya ne maalu munda Kalwa ubwela mu cyalukamu

badi bitaba: Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi upatula Dîyi dikulu dieena tshieena bwalu tshidi tshilonda etshi: KA DIOSHA Twêtu, Beena Kongu, Basangisha kudi kutuyâya ne kutudi tufumina mu majinga a mpatshi a budikadidi, a bweena muntu, a diswikangana,a bululama ne a mudimu; Bikala ne dijinga dieetu dimwe dia kwibaka munkatshi mwa Aflika Mbulamatadi wa mêyi ne mikandu ne Ditunga dia bukole ne bubanji dishindameena pa mungalata mulelela wa tshidiidi, wa bubanji, wa nsombelu wa bantu ne wa bunkambwa; Pa kumona ne dipangika dia bululama ne mamuma adi, dipangila dia kunyooka benzavi, ditabaleela anu balela ne balunda, ditabaleela anu beena polovensa wa momumwe, ditabaleela anu beena tshisamba tshia momumwe, ditabaleela anu beena dîku dia momumwe, mu dilondangana diawu, ke didi mfuki wa diupuka dia mishinga yetu ya bunkambwa ne wa dinyanguka dia ditunga; Bajadika dipangadika diabo dia kulaminyina ne kukolesha budikadidi ne kabumwe ka ditunga mu dinemeka dia ngikadilu yetu mîmpe mishilashilangana ne ya pa bwaayi; Bajadikulula dianyisha dieetu ne didifila ne dilamata dieetu ku Déclaration Universelle des Droits de l Homme, ku Charte Africaine des Droits de l Homme et des peuples , ku Conventions des Nations Unies sur les Droits de l Anfants et sur les Droits de la Femme, nangananga ku kipatshila ka dileeja mpala dia momumwe dia mulume ne mukaji mu bishimikidi bia ditunga ne mu bulongolodi bwa matunga butangila dilama ne dikolesha mapa a bumuntu; Batuma kudi dijinga dia kumona Mbulamatadi ya Aflika idisangisha ne yenza midimu mu diumvwangana bwa kujululula ne kukolesha kabumwe ka beena Aflika mu ndongolwelu ya Aflika mujima, ya bitupa ne ya bitupa bia mwinshi bia Aflika, bwa kupeesha beena Aflika mishindu mîmpe menemene ya kuvunguluka ne ya kutantshisha bubanji ne nsombelu wa bantu; Badifila anu ku dikolesha dia bukwatshishanganyi bwa matunga bwikala ne makasa ne ku diumvwangana dia bisamba bia mu buloba bujima, bikala baneemaka bumuntu bwa umwe ne umwe ne mêyi maludiki a didikookesha ne a bujima bwa maloba a Mbulamatadi umwe ne umwe; Bajadikulula budikookeshi bweetu kabuyi kumbusha anyi kushipa bwa kudilongolola badilekelela ne bwa kukolesha maalu etu a tshidiidi, a bubanji, a nsombelu ne a bunkambwa, muntu ne muntu bilondeshila bweenda bukola bwa lungenyi; Bikala bamanya bîmpe majitu etu ku mêsu kwa Nzambi , kwa Ditunga, kwa Aflika ne kwa Buloba bujima; Tudi tweela dîyi dikole twamba ne tudi bitaba Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi

Muntu udi ne tshitshu, udi uhidia kunvua dî dia muakuidi udi muimane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumukuatshia mudimu, anyi dî dia mulumbuluishi, nebashihe muntu eu: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Bialala handi mulume ne biamumatshila katshetshi, yeye neikale ne bukoya tô matuku muanda mutekete, bulalu buonso budiye ulala nebuikale ne bukoya
Tshidi ne lupetu lulongama lufila kudi Lubandi lwa Mbulamatadi lwipatshila bia lukama bia lupetu lônso lwa ditunga dijima ludi lubwêla ne ludi Mbulamatadi upeta ku tshidimu tshiônso
Bikala Yehowa ne disanka bualu buetu, yeye nealue n etu mu buloba ebu, neatuhebu; buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Bakumuka mu Yotebata, bakashikama mu Abalona

Kadi bikala muntu ne muena mutumba n andi lukuna, umualamina, ubika, umutaha tô ne hafileye, ne bianyemeye ku umue wa misoko ei; hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebatuale bantu, nebamukuatemu, nebamufile mu bianza bia musombuedi bua kufueye
Bena Moaba bakatamba kutshina bantu, bualu bua bungi buabo; mitshima ya Bena Moaba yakanyingalala bualu bua Bena Isalele
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Nyaya Nunku bakatuma muan abo Lebeka ne muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi ne muhika wa Abalahama ne bantu bandi
Kadi bibabo nyama mu tshianza tshiandi, yeye neafute mukelenge wandi
Nuikale ne bihimu bimpe ne bihiminu bimpe, nuikale ne épha muimpe ne hin muimpe meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakantaha tula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Nealongolole mampa dituku dia lumingu ku mpala kua Yehowa ku lumingu ku lumingu, yeye nênzele Bena Isalele bualu ebu bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele
Tshiena ngitabusha di diandi bua kulekela Bena Isalele

Kadi bikala dikenga dikuabo dilonda ku nyima, wewe neufue muoyo ku muoyo, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu, tshianza ku tshianza, dikasa ku dikasa, udi muoshe mukuabo kahia nebamuoshe kabidi, udi utaha mukuabo mputa nebamutahe biandi, udi ukuma mukuabo mibundabunda nebamukume biandi
Bualu bua bobo nebakudimune mutshima wa muan enu mulume, bua yeye kandondi meme bua kukuatshileye nzambi mikuabo mudimu: nunku Yehowa neanukuatshile tshiji, neanujimishe lubilu
Yeye wakaya, wakalua n ai kudi mamu andi, ne mamu andi wakalamba munyinyi muimpe wa dihembu bu muakasua tatu andi
Udi wangata mapangadika mu mukanda wa dekele

Nenufile bintu ebi kudi Yehowa mu matuku anudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuditshiha n ai ne bintu budi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne milambu yenu ya kuosha ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua ne milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Genese Bana Babo ne Yosefe Badi Bahingana ne Benyamina Tshiole tshiakatamba bukole mu buloba
Badi mua kumukuma mikumu makumi anai, kadi kabahitshi: biahilabo mikumu ei, muan enu neikale bu muntu wa hatuhu kunudi
Mose wakambila tatu andi muenu ne, Bualu bua bantu badi balue kundi bua kuebesha Nzambi malu

Bantu bamwela diboku mulu Bwa bwimpa bwenda Yoyoyo Kemayi Muntu wa bwela mu cyalukamu Kusekiseki mwineba Maria Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Kabulu kwamba kusekiseki mwineba Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Wewa muswe kucina maalu Sanka olonda meyi ne mikandu ya Mulopo Kwema dinanga munda mwebe Unanga Nzambi webe kumpala kwa bionso Unemeke baledi bembe Kuvualakanyi kantu ka mukwebe shabana eyo Mukàjì wa benda kelengi
Nunku bakamuidika dina ne Pelese Ne ku nyima muan abo wakadi ne muonshi mukunze musuika ku tshianza tshiandi wakahatuka, bakamuidika dina ne, Zela

Nenudie bidia ebi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku muanda mutekete, mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka ne bintu bienu bionso biakakumbana, ne mudimu wonso unuakenza ne bianza bienu: nenuikale ne disanka dingi
Yeye wakababuesha buonso buabo mu nsubu wa lukanu to matuku asatu

Halua dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo wa muanda mutekete hanuashikisha kuhuola bintu, nenudie bidia bia Yehowa matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia kuikisha, ne dituku dia muanda mukulu nedikale dituku dia kuikisha
Yosefe wakidika muan a bute dina ne, Manashe; bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpuisha muoyo bua mudimu wanyi mukole ne bua bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu anyi
Wakenza nkanu ya or mai ya kuteka ku matumba anai, ibidi ku luseke lumue, ibidi ku luseke lukuabo
Wakenza bilulu bia miosa ya mbushi dikumi ne tshilulu tshimue bua kuteka ha mutu ha nsubu
Mukashi wakabika, wakaya mu nshila wandi, wakavula tshilulu tshiandi tshikudika, wakaluata bilulu bia mu lufuila kabidi
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakabakuata, yeye wakumuka
Yeye wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Geshoma, wakamba ne, Nakadi mushikame mu buloba bua benyi

Bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia bena nvita ne tuhita tua binunu ne binunu ne tuhita tua nkama ne nkama, bakalua kudi Mose, bakambila Mose ne, Bantu bebe bakabala bungi bua bena nvita badi ku nyima kuetu, nansha umue wetu udi mushale
Mesa a Bidia Bilesha Ek
Buloba nebuikale ne bidimu bia buhafe tô bu bungi bua bidimu binuakuhidia kushiya buloba bua kubandabu hanuakashikamamu

Kanungu ka Makumbaja ku tshingenyingenyi tshia dîyi dia lupetu kabeena baangata ne mushinga to padi dianyisha dilela dikeepesha dia lupetu ludi lubwela anyi divudija dituula dia lupetu, pa kumbusha pikalawu malêja mushindu wa kulongolola
Kuikadi ne lukuna mu mutshima kudi muan enu, kadi ubele muena mutumba n ebe, bua wewe kutuadi bubi bua bualu buandi
Hagâ wakalelela Abalama muana mulume Abalama wakidika dina dia muana wakamulelela Hagâ ne, Yishemaele
dieepula ku njiwu idi ifumina ku kapia anyi ku bukenka bwa kapia ne diumusha dia bintu bidi bituma bukenke;
Yeye wakamuha Bileha, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi, ne Yakoba wakaya kudiye

Ngendu ya pa mâyi a mbuwa ne a misulu , ngendu ya mu kapeepa, njila ya njanja, njila ya buloba ne mishindu mikwabo ya dimanyishangana mianda, mifuka kudi nzambi anyi kudi bantu, idi itwangaja polovensa ibidi anyi ya bûngi anyi tshipaapu tshia Ditunga ne tshipaapu tshia ditunga dieenyi anyi mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga miamba ne nyidi yambulwisha ditunga dijima nansha yôyi mikale isanganyibwa mu teletwale wa polovensa kampanda;
Kuakuitabusha bua meme kusangana mishiku ne bana banyi ba balume ne bana banyi ba bakashi munyi
Bakeluba bakolola mahuahua abo kulu, bakabuikila tshibuikilu tshia mushete ne mahuahua abo, bakadi belangana mpala, mpala yabo yakadi ku tshibuikilu tshia mushete
Bikalabo babakibue kudi balume ba mu tshisamba tshikuabo tshia Bena Isalele, nunku nebanyeme buhianyi buabo ku buhianyi bua batatu etu, nebabusangishe ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo
Utshiteke ku mpala kua bantu banyi ne kua bantu bebe, bobo balumbulule tshilumbu tshietu
Hanuabuela mu budimi bua tumuma bua mukuenu, nudi mua kudia tumuma kukuta tente, kadi kanuangatshi tumuma mu tshisaka
Mose wakangata umue wa makumi atanu wa bintu bia Bena Isalele, ne wa bantu ne wa bimuna wakabifila kudi Bena Lewi bakadi balama nsubu wa Yehowa, muakambila Yehowa Mose
Bialueye ne nyama udibo bafila bu mulambu kudi Yehowa, bintu bionso bidibo baha Yehowa nebikale bintu bia tshijila
Dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Bobo nebabikile bantu ku mikuna, nebashiheleku milambu ya buakane: bua bobo nebadie bintu bia bungi bia mu mai manene, ne bintu bimpe bidi bisokoma muinshi mua nsenga
Miloho ya Moaba yakabika, yakahingana kudi Balaka, yakamba ne, Belâma udi uhidia bua kulua n etu
Hakikisha mushete, yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, uhingana biebe kudi binunu bia binunu bia Bena Isalele
Bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebele mpungi, mpungi neyikale bu mukenji, ku bikondo bienu bionso tshiendelele
Isaka wakebesha muan andi ne, Muan anyi, wakamona ntole lubilu nunku munyi
Kadi bikalabo kabayi basangana muibi, nunku muena nsubu nealue biandi kudi balumbuluishi, bua bobo bajingulule ne yeye wakalenga biuma bia mukuandi tshianza, anyi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, ne bimuna bia Bena Lewi mu miaba ya bimuna biabo, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi meme ndi Yehowa Bua kuhikula ban a bute ba Bena Isalele, nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mutekete ne basatu, badi bahita balume ba Bena Lewi bungi, newangate nshekele itanu ku muntu ne ku muntu bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi nshekele udi bu guéras makumi abidi : wewe neufue nshekele ya bungi buabo buakahikulabo, kudi Alona ne kudi bana bandi balume

Lubena, Shimeona, Lewi ne Yuda, Yisakâ, Zebuluna ne Benyamina, Dana ne Nafatale, Gada ne Ashe Bantu bonso ba munda mua Yakoba bakadi makumi muanda mutekete, Yosefe wakadi mu Ejipitu diambedi Yosefe wakafua ne bana babo bonso, ne bantu bonso ba mulongo au Bena Isalele bakakumbana ba bungi, bakavulangana, bakalua bakole be, bakula mu buloba tente
Adi a njila umwe anyi a mantonya
Kanudi mashi, nuahongolole ha buloba bu mai
Tatu wandi Isaka wakamuambila ne, Semena ha buihi, muan anyi, utuangane n anyi mishiku

Ndongamu , diteeja dia tshidiidi tshiônso tshijima anyi mukanda udibo bateela ku tulongo twapitshi badi bawangata bu mwanyishibwa pa kumusha padibo banyishai mukanda wa ditangilula mu mikenji miteeka mu tulongo ne twa kanungu aka
Mukashi wakambila nyoka ne, Tudi mua kudia mamuma a mitshi yonso idi mu budimi, kadi mamuma a mutshi udi munkatshi mua budimi, Nzambi wakamba ne, Kanuadi, kanualengi, bua kanufu
Bela wakafua, ne Yobaba, muana wa Zela, muana wa Bosela, wakadia bukelenge buandi
Bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua ne bidi bidikoka hanshi kabiena biakane kunudi; kanubidi

Nunku yeye neashihe mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, nealue ne mashi andi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika, nênze bu muakenzeye ne mashi a muana mulume wa ngombe, neamiamine mashi ku tshibuikilu tshia mushete wa Nzambi ne ku mpala kua tshi kabidi

Bualu ebu kabuikadi kudi bua wewe kuenza nunku bua kushiha bantu bakane ne bantu babi hohamue, biwenza nunku bantu bakane nebikale muomumue ne bantu babi, bualu ebu kabuikadi kûdi, Mulumbuluishi wa buloba buonso katu wenza bimpe, anyi
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue nebuikale coudées makumi asatu, ne butshiama bua tshi coudées mai, idikisha bilulu dikumi ne tshimue ne luidi lumue

Aba mbana ba balume ba Luele, muana wa Esau: mukelenge Nahata ne mukelenge Zela ne mukelenge Shama ne mukelenge Miza, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Luele mu buloba bua Edome, aba mbana ba balume ba Basemata, mukashi wa Esau
Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Shulishadai, mukelenge wa bana ba Shimeona, wakafua bintu dituku ditanu
Kanuenji bibi hanualumbulula tshilumbu, kanunemekedi muntu muhele, kanutumbishi muntu munene, kadi nulumbulule bilumbu bia muena mutumba n enu ne buakane mu mutshima

Tshiji tshiakakuata Yehowa dituku adi, ne yeye wakaditshiha ne, Bulelela, nansha umue wa balume aba bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, ba mu bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, neatangile buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba, bualu bua bobo kabakalonda ne mitshima yabo yonso, anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, Muena Kenizi, ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, bualu bua bobo bakalonda Yehowa ne mitshima yabo yonso
Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Sihona Bukole Nom
Shekeme muana mulume wa Hamo, Muena Hiwi, mukelenge muana wa buloba, wakamutangila wakamukuata, wakalala n andi, wakamufuisha bundu
Binuahua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muoyo, binualonda nzambi mikuabo, binuenzela nzambi mikuabo midimu, binuayitendelela, ndi nnumanyisha lelu ne, Nenufue bulelela

Tatu wa mushikankunde neambile bakulu ne, Nakafila muan anyi kudi mulume eu bu mukashi wandi, ne yeye udi umukina; yeye wakambila bakuabo mei a bundu ne, Tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi muana webe; kadi ebi mbimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama
Tuakamona bantu ba nfiondo, bana balume ba Anaka, hakalelabo kudi Nefilima hatuakaditangila, tuakadi bu mpasu, tuakadi nunku ku mesu kuabo kabidi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakulua tshihi, anyi
Bukalenga bwa bandumbulula ne bukoshi bwa nsambu
Bakumuka mu Alamona dibelatayima, bakashikama mu mikuna ya Abalama, mitangilangane ne Mukuna wa Nebo
Nuvuluke matuku anyi a lumingu, nuikale ne kanemu mu nsubu wanyi, meme ndi Yehowa
Ne mashi au neabuikidibue
Wakenza bualu bubi ne, Udi ukumina mukuenu tshinyi

Wewe newangate dianyi dia tshimpanga, ne mukila udi ne dianyi ne dianyi didi ku mala ne lukutu lua ku mutshima, ne tumuma tubidi ne dianyi diabi ne tshibelu tshia ku tshianza tshia balume, bualu bua tshimpanga etshi ntshia kujidila n atshi bakuidi
Bena Isalele bakaya, bakenza nunku, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Alona, mbu muakenzabo
Etshi ntshihungidi tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe ne tunkanunuina tuebe tshinudi n atshi bua kutumikila ne, Muana mulume yonso wa munkatshi muenu atengudibue
Mose wakamuambila ne, Hanaluhuka mu musoko eu, nengolole bianza bianyi kudi Yehowa, makubakuba neashike, mabue a nvula neashike kabidi, bualu bua kukumanyisha ne buloba budi bua Yehowa
Malu atshidi masokoka adi malu a Yehowa, Nzambi wetu: kadi malu adi masokolola adi malu etu ne a bana betu tshiendelele, bua tuetu tuenze mei onso a mikenji ei
Nuenu nenutumikile mikenji yanyi, nengenze meme ndi Yehowa
Utangile hanshi mu muaba webe wa tshijila mu diulu, uvudishile bantu bebe ba Isalele disanka, ne buloba buwakutuha, bu muwakalaya bankambua betu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Nuenu nuenze bualu ebu bu tshilele tshienu ne tshia bana benu tshiendelele

Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshiabanyi tshia mpetu ne bintu mudimu watshi udi wa kufila lupetu bwa kukumbajija bingenyingenyi ne ndongamu ya dieela dia lupetu mu midimu ya Mbulamatadi, bwa kujadika diswikangana dia beena ditunga ne bwa kololola dishilangana mu divunguluka pankatshi pa polovensa ne pankatshi pa bitupa bia teletwala bikwabo bidiludika
Ya biebe kudi Palô ne dinda, hayeye ku mai, wimane kukala kua musulu bua kusangakena n andi, uye ne mulangala wakakudimuka nyoka au mu tshianza tshiebe
Muanjelo wa Nzambi, wakadi wenda ku mpala kua Bena Isalele, wakumukaku, wakaya ku nyima kuabo, ne difutu diakumuka ku mpala kuabo kabidi, diakimana ku nyima kuabo
Wakenzaku tshioshelu, wakatshidika dina ne, El Elohe Isalele

Yosefe wakaya kujika tatu wandi, ne bena mudimu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Palô, ne bakulu ba mu nsubu wandi, ne bakulu bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa Yosefe ne bana babo bonso, ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi, bakaya n andi, anu bana bakese ne mikoko ne bimuna biakashala mu buloba bua Goshene
Ulembeleshe tshilulu ha bitubuidi, Ulue ne mushete wa Nzambi ku nyima kua tshilulu, tshilulu atshi netshikale hankatshi ha muaba wa tshijila ne muaba mutambe wa tshijila
Meme nenshimbule bitendelelu bienu bidi ku mutu kua mikuna, nenkose mpingu inudi nutendelela n ai diba, nengele bitalu bienu ha mutu ha mpingu yenu, mutshima wanyi neunulengulule

Ya ye lele ya ye lele Nganji kubikila Maamù eh Mamyanyi mwa Mbuya kasasu eh Mambi wa Tumba ne Tshala eh Mwana mudikaya yampongo eh Moyi munda nganyi wa ngakwile eh Ngipata mukunda muya mukanka mwana we lekela we Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi e Mwâna we lekela kudila mwadi e Bakulumpa bakudima kwěpì
Yeye wa kamba ne, Tangila, ndi muntu mununu, tshiena mumanye dituku dia lufu luanyi
Mose wakamba ne, Adi kadiena dî dia bantu badi bahita bakuabo bukole, ne kadiena dî dia bantu bakutambibua bukole, ndi munvue mutoyi wa bantu badi bimba misambu
Mu bintu bia dîku mudi bintu bia mulume ku luseke lwa baku beende, bia bâna ba mabeela pa ludimi ne bia bâna , nansha bakaadi bakole, badi ku bukookeshi bwa baledi
Kanuikadi ne biamu bibidi bia kuidikisha n abi majitu, ne tshinene ne tshikese
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana, Amiele, muana mulume wa Gemali

Noa wakaluhuka ne bana bandi balume ne mukashi andi ne bakashi ba bana bandi, ne nyama yonso ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi ne nyunyu yonso ne tshintu tshionso tshidi tshiendakana ha buloba, bu mudi mishindu yabi, biakaluhuka mu buatu
Bikaleye mulume udi uhita bidimu makumi asambombo, wewe neubale nshekele dikumi ne itanu, ne bikaleye mukashi, nshekele dikumi
Lelu nembange kubuesha buowa ne ditshina mu mitshima ya bantu bonso badi muinshi mua diulu, badi bunvua lumu luenu: ne hunvuabo, nebazakale ne mitshima yabo nebanyingalale bualu buenu
Udi mwengeleki wa budikadidi bwa ditunga, wa bujima bwa tshipâpu tshia ditunga, wa budikookeshi bwa ditunga ne wa dineemeka dia ndondu ne diumvwangana ne bakwa matunga
Kanungu ka Dîyi didi dipeta bwenzeji matuku makumi asatu panyima pa dipatuka diaadi mu tshibejibeji tshia mbulamatadi, amba amu dioodio dilongolola mushindi mukwabo

Bena Lewi neitabe, nebambile bantu bonso ba mu Isalele ne dî dikole ne: Muntu yonso udi usonga luhingu anyi udi wenza luhingu ne tshiamu tshiakatulabo kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule, udi kujadika mu musokoko, ntshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, udi ne mulau
Bintu ebi bidi ku mpala kuebe mbia nganyi
Nunku ujikemu tshitalu
Mikalu ya polovensa ne ya tshimenga tshia Kinshasa badi bayikosa kudi dîyi dilongolodi

Nungashile tshishihelu tshia buloba, nufile ha mutu hatshi milambu ya kuosha, ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, ne mikoko yenu ne ngombe yenu, ku miaba yonso kundi nnuvuluisha dina dianyi, nendue kunudi, nennusankishe
Bobo nebangate mashi, nebâmiamine ku mutshi wa ha mutu ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bibidi bia mushiku wa mbelu wa nsubu mudibo bamudîla
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi pende ne budikadidi bwa kweela meji, bwa kusungula bwîmpe ne bubi ne budikadidi bwa ditabuuja
Bakenza bintu ebi bionso ne ntalanta wa or nkayandi
Yakoba wakamba ne, Anji kuditshiha kundi diambedi
Udi umanyisha beena ditunga dipangadika edi mu muyuki wenda
Alona udi nganyi bua nuenu nudi numutontolola

Yosefe wakabangata bubidi buabo, Efelayima ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume ne mpala wandi mutangile ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia Isalele, ne Manashe ku tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi mutangile ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Isalele, wakabasemesha ha buihi n andi
Wakalua ne mulambu wa bantu, wakangata mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila bubi bua bantu, wakamushiha, wakamufila bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, bu muakenzeye mulambu wa diambedi
Bikaleye mumukume ne tshintu tshia tshiamu tshifike, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu bulelela
Bakumuka mu Libina, bakashikama mu Lisa
Bobo nebashikame mu misoko ei, ne bimuna ne bintu biabo ne nyama yabo mikuabo nebikale mu buloba budi bunyunguluka misoko
Bimuna biabo bionso ne bintu biabo bionso ne nyama yabo yonso kabiena bikale bu bietu, anyi

Wakaha bana balume ba Gêshona makalu abidi ne ngombe mai, bu muakadi mudimu wabo wakaha bana balume ba Melali makalu anai ne ngombe muanda mukulu bu muakadi mudimu wabo wakenzabo, ku tshianza tshia Itamâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi

Disanka edi nedilue ha mutu ha Yosefe, ne ku lubombo lua mutu wa muntu wakadi mutahuluke kudi bana babo
Mose wakambila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne Bena Isalele bonso nunku
Meme nenjidile ntenta wa kusangakena ne tshioshelu, nenjidile Alona ne bana bandi balume kabidi bua kunkuatshilabo mudimu wa buakuidi
Bihanga ne mahu a tshitekelu biakadi bia tshituha tshia or tshimue, bakatula bintu bionso ne tshiamu tshia or nkayandi
dilonda dia bukookeshi bwa kabukulu;
Bantu badi ne Buowa Ek
Lakele wakamba ne, Nakasangana bibula bikole ne mukulu wanyi wa bakashi, nakumutamba bukole, wakamuidika dina ne, Nafatale
Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kukumbaja mudibi bikengela makanyika ende kumpala kwa Mbulamatadi

Dutelonone Tshihungidi Tshiakahunga Yehowa ne Bena Isalele mu Moaba Â mmei a tshihungidi akambila Yehowa Mose bua kuhanga ne Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Moaba, ku mutu kua tshihungidi tshiakahungeye n abo mu Holeba
Mukelenge Alada, Muena Kanâna, wakadi ushikama ku luseke lua ku Sude lua buloba bua Kanâna, wakunvua lumu ne, Bena Isalele balualua
Nunku buhianyi bumue kabuena bumuka ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba, tshisamba ne tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele netshikale ne buhianyi buatshi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Kumutshinyi nansha, bualu bua nakamufila mu tshianza tshiebe, ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi, wewe neumuenzele bu muwakuenzela Sifiona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona
Belâma wakaya ne Balaka, bakalua ku Kîyata husota
Abimeleke wakambila Isaka ne, Umuka kutudi, bualu bua wewe udi ututamba bukole
Bualu kai wewe wakunyema mu musokoko kuakungambila, bua meme kukutuma ne disanka ne misambu ne biombelu
Mose wakabambila ne, Nuakushiya bakashi bonso ne muoyo, anyi
Bakasa Hebelone bidimu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua Soana mu Ejipitu

Kanungu ka Bulongolodi bwa ditangilula dia Dîyi dikulu budi bupalakaja kudi: a Mulombodi wa ditunga; b Bukalenga bunene panyima pa dishintakaja ngenyi dia Tshipangu tshia baminisitila; c Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu tshia tshimamwenda wa bukalenga pa dilomba dia tshia bibidi tshimwe tshia batshipwita; d Tshitupa tshia beena Kongu tshia bantu
Mikenji ei kayena dishiya dia mai manene, bua nuenu nuambe ne, Nganyi watusabukila dishiya dia mai manene bua kulua n ai kutudi ne bua kutunyuisha bua tuetu kuyenza
Bakimba dina dia mai dikuabo, bakaditandila kabidi
Hakunvua bantu lumu alu lubi, bakadila nansha mundi umue wa kaluata bintu bia kudilengesha n abi

Lewitiki Alona Udi Ufila Milambu Hakahita matuku muanda mukulu, Mose wakabikila Alona ne bana bandi balume ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele, wakambila Alona ne, Angata kana ka ngombe bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne tshimpanga, bidi kabiyi ne tshitema, bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ubifile ku mesu kua Yehowa
Muntu yonso udi uhambuisha muntu mufofo mu nshila udi ne mulau
Nunku hatuakahingana kudi muntu webe, tatu wetu, bakamuambila mei a mukelenge wanyi
Budi bukosa nsambu pa tshipaapu tshijima tshia ditunga mu dîna dia bantu bônso
Bialala mulume ne mukashi, biamueleye bilumi, bubidi buabo nebadioweshe ne mai, nebikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku bua matuku a kudia bidia akasungula Yehowa
Dina dia diboko dia kumudilu didi Pishona, didi dinyunguluka buloba buonso bua Hawila, kudi or, or wa mu buloba abu udi muimpe, ne mabue a mushinga mukole a bdelhum ne a onyx adiku
Kanungu ka Dijikija dia dipanga dia mukanda didi dipangadika dia ditunga dijima,didi Bukalenga bunene ne tshia kwenzela ndongamu wa sungansunga bwa kudikumbaja
Anyi biaditshiha muntu lubilu ne mishiku yandi bua kuenza bualu bubi anyi bualu buimpe, biaditshiha muntu lubilu nunku ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, hamanyeye bualu, yeye neahile
Nzambi wakabaha tula mu Ejipitu, yeye udi ne bukole bu nyama wa mbowa
Kanungu ka Bishimikidi bia ditunga bidi : Mfumu wa Ditunga; Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga; Bukalenga bunene; Bukalenga bwa bandumbulula
Nunku nudisunguile muaba ku mpenge kua tshitudilu bua nuenu nuye ha bule bua kuhuya munda
Tshisamba ne tshisamba tô ne bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele nebitume bantu tshinunu ku nvita
Sila wakalela Tubalakana, yeye wakadi mutudi wa tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshiamu tshifike, muakuny andi mukashi wakadi Nama
Balaka wakamushihela ngombe ne mikoko, wakantumina Belâma ne miloho yakadi n andi
Abalahama wakabika muana wandi mulume wakamulelela Sala ne, Isaka Abalahama wakatengula muana wandi mulume Isaka hakahita matuku muanda mukulu, bu muakamuambila Nzambi
Nzambi wakamueneka kudi La bana, Muena Alama, mu tshiota butuku, wakamuambila ne, Udimuke, kuambidi Yakoba nansha di dimpe nansha di dibi

Tshituha tshiakaheta bantu bakaya ku nvita tshiakadi mikoko binunu nkama isatu ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama itanu, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi mikoko nkama isambombo ne makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bitanu ne nkama mai
Luhanza lua Palô luakadi mu tshianza tshianza, nakahuola tumuma atu, nakatukamina mu luhanza lua Palô, nakateka luhanza mu tshianza tshia Palo
Wewe neubilengeshe, neubijidile, muntu yonso udi ubilenga tshianza neikale wa tshijila
Dîyi didi ditangila masungulangana didi dileeja mushindu wa kusakidila bûngi bwa bantu bwa masungula a batshipwita bakulumpa mu tshimenga tshia Kinshasa
Kanungu ka Bintu bia muntu nkayende bidi bia kuneemekibwa bikole
Udi mwa kushipa, kushintulula anyi kukeepesha manyooka
Yetelo wakasanka bua malu mimpe onso akenzela Yehowa Bena Isalele, bualu bua yeye wakabasungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu
Dibikidibua dia Besalele ne Oholiaba Ek
Bualu kai nebajimishe dina dia tatu wetu munkatshi mua diku diandi bualu bua yeye kakadi ne muana wa balume
Muakuidi neabioshe ha tshioshelu etshi ntshintu tshia kudia tshidibo bafila bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu, dianyi dionso ndia Yehowa
Mpete diakalengele ku mesu kua mukelenge wanyi Nunku Esau wakaya mu nshila wandi wa ku Sei dituku adi
Bualu ebu kabuena bunusankisha
Njila mwibîdi : Bidi bitangila budikookeshi Kanungu kitânu Didikookesha dia ditunga didi bwaalu bwa beena ditunga
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Tangila, dituku dia lufu luebe dikadi ha buihi: bikila Yoshua, ne bubidi buenu nudisangishe mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua meme mmudimushe
Bakumuka mu Mala bakatua ku Elima mu Elima muakadi mpokolo ya mai dikumi ne ibidi ne mabue a ngashi makumi muanda mutekete bakashikamaku
Mose wakabambila ne, Imanai, nganji kunvua dî kudi Yehowa bua bualu buenu
Nenteke ditahulula hankatshi ha bantu banyi ne bantu bebe, nengenze tshimanyinu etshi makelela
Bikala mundi muenze bualu bubi ku mpukahuka, neafile muana mukashi wa mbushi wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Biwaya biebe n etu, hashishe bikala Yehowa mutuenzele bimpe, tuetu netukuenzele bimpe
Wakamba ne, Tshiena nshiha musoko binasangana bantu bakane makumi anai ne batanu
Wakungambila ne, Yeye udi muan etu wa bakashi, bua meme kumuangata bu mukashi wanyi bualu kai

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wangate Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, udi ne Nyuma munda muandi, utentekashe tshianza tshiebe ha mutu n andi, umushikike ku mpala kua Eleazâ muakuidi ne ku mpala kua bantu bonso, umuambile dî ku mesu kuabo
Genese Mulayi wa Kuledibua kua Isaka Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalahama hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mamale hakadiye ushikama ku mbelu kua ntenta wandi munda munya
Mose wakatshunguluka, wakahueka mu tshibanda ne mabue abidi akadi ne mikenji mifundahu mu bianza biandi, mabue akadi mafu nda nseke yau ibidi, ha luseke lumue ne ha luseke lukuabo
Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi, mu dienza dia dîyi, mwa kukosa, dîba diônso, mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu
Yuda wakambila bana babo ne, Hatuashiha muan etu, ne hatuasokoka mashi andi, netushale ne tshintu kai
Bakamumona Yehowa uya kutangila bualu ebu
Yeye wakela kabalu ne muntu wakadi wenda ha nyima haku mu bunene bua mai manene
Buludi buatshi buakadi coudées itanu ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, ne bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées isatu
Nebamuidike dina mu Isalele ne, Nsubu wa udi ne tshisabata tshiandi tshisulula
Nunku nenutahulule Bena Isalele ku bukoya buabo, bua bobo kabafu mu bukoya buabo honabo nsubu wanyi wa tshitendelelu tshidi munkatshi muabo
Muadi wa mashi a muakuny ebe udi wela di kundi difume ha buloba

Muakuidi neafile umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia Muakuidi neafile milambu ei bua kumubuikidila n ai bubi ku mpala kua Yehowa bualu bua bukoya bua katshetshi kandi
